MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Right, but will it be alright just like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Right, but will it be alright just like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うん。誰も来なかったら、お茶とか飲んでゆっくりしてて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Yeah. If no one comes, just kick back and drink some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Yeah. If no one comes, just kick back and drink some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮長は部屋を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかなぁ。留守番かぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: So that's my job today. Holding down the fort.
MESSAGE.Translation: So that's my job today. Holding down the fort.

MESSAGE.JP: 仕事といえばそうなんだろうけれど、いきなり暇になってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess that was part of the job here, but it was strange to suddenly have nothing to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess that was part of the job here, but it was strange to suddenly have nothing to do.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やることがない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's nothing to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's nothing to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、机の上に、何かの資料集がある。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, on top of the desk there was a pile of documents.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, on top of the desk there was a pile of documents.

MESSAGE.JP: 暇潰しに読んでみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Guess I'll read some to kill time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess I'll read some to kill time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、なになに…寮会とは、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, let's see... 'What is a dormitory committee,' huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, let's see... 'What is a dormitory committee,' huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前からうちの学校は、生徒の自主性を重んじる、と思っていたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I always knew that our school placed emphasis on student autonomy and self-determination.
MESSAGE.Translation: I always knew that our school placed emphasis on student autonomy and self-determination.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮会の仕事はずいぶん多岐にわたるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't realize how many things the dorm committee was responsible for.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't realize how many things the dorm committee was responsible for.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会の補助で委員会活動があるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't know they had committees that provide support to the dorm committee...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't know they had committees that provide support to the dorm committee...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それで色々な委員会活動が部活みたいに活発なんだな。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like there were different clubs and activities, there were all sorts of such committees.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like there were different clubs and activities, there were all sorts of such committees.

MESSAGE.JP: 資料集から目を上げると。
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted my eyes from the stack of papers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted my eyes from the stack of papers.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん…？　わぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...? Waah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...? Waah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが無言で僕を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was silently staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was silently staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ど、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Uh, something the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Uh, something the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうしてあなたがここにいるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Why are you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Why are you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、どうしてって言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm not sure myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm not sure myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮長に留守番頼まれたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was asked by the Dorm Head to hold the fort.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was asked by the Dorm Head to hold the fort.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「寮長が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The Dorm Head asked you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The Dorm Head asked you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか不審そうな目で見られる。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason there was suspicion in her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason there was suspicion in her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ふん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Is that so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Is that so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 肩をすくめる二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: 一つ離れた隣の席に座り、何かの書類整理をはじめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a seat one over from mine and began to organize some documents.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a seat one over from mine and began to organize some documents.

MESSAGE.JP: 沈黙が続く。
MESSAGE.EN: The dead silence continued.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dead silence continued.

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに耐えられなくなって言った。
MESSAGE.EN: After a while I just couldn't take it any more, so I spoke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a while I just couldn't take it any more, so I spoke up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「て、手伝おうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do, do you need some help?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do, do you need some help?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 怪訝そうに書類から顔を上げる二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked up from the papers with a suspicious glance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked up from the papers with a suspicious glance.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だから手伝おうか、と思って。書類整理」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I was just thinking I should give you a hand. With the papers, I mean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I was just thinking I should give you a hand. With the papers, I mean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰に言ってるのかと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And I was wondering who you were talking to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And I was wondering who you were talking to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …部屋には僕と二木さんしかいないんだけどね…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, it was just the two of us in the room....
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, it was just the two of us in the room....

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん二木さんに言ってるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You, obviously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You, obviously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「自分でやるからいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll be fine by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll be fine by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素っ気ない答え。
MESSAGE.EN: Her reply was curt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her reply was curt.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋には紙をめくる音だけが響く。
MESSAGE.EN: The only sound in the room was the sound of rustling paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only sound in the room was the sound of rustling paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは無表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was expressionless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was expressionless.

MESSAGE.JP: 機械的に作業をこなしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was like a robot, continuing her task mechanically.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was like a robot, continuing her task mechanically.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What is it you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What is it you want?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was lost for a second there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was lost for a second there.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「だから、何か用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm asking if you need something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm asking if you need something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じっと見てるなんて、不躾じゃないの、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're being fairly impolite, staring at someone like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're being fairly impolite, staring at someone like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そ、それ、なんの書類？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...W, what, what documents are those?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...W, what, what documents are those?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気詰まりな雰囲気を打破しようと、僕はなんとか話しかけてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to start a conversation in an attempt to dispel the awkward atmosphere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to start a conversation in an attempt to dispel the awkward atmosphere.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「寮会の名簿」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's the dorm committee's roster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's the dorm committee's roster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事はないと思ったのに答えは返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't expect her to respond, but she did.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't expect her to respond, but she did.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 会話が終わってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: And the conversation was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the conversation was over.

MESSAGE.JP: しょうがないので、立ち上がってお茶があるところまで行く。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing for it, so I stood up and went to the tea set.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing for it, so I stood up and went to the tea set.

MESSAGE.JP: たくさんあるので迷ったが、無難に緑茶にする。
MESSAGE.EN: There were tons of different kinds so I was a little lost, but finally I decided to play it safe with some green tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were tons of different kinds so I was a little lost, but finally I decided to play it safe with some green tea.

MESSAGE.JP: 急須に茶葉を投入。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the tea leaves into a small teapot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the tea leaves into a small teapot.

MESSAGE.JP: 残り少なかったらしく、ふたさじで茶葉の袋は空になった。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't much left in the package, so I ended up emptying the bag of tea into the pot.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't much left in the package, so I ended up emptying the bag of tea into the pot.

MESSAGE.JP: 電気ポットからお湯を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I poured in some hot water from the electric pot.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I poured in some hot water from the electric pot.

MESSAGE.JP: お茶のいい香り。
MESSAGE.EN: The tea smelled sweet.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tea smelled sweet.

MESSAGE.JP: ずずー。お茶をすする。
MESSAGE.EN: Sip, sip. I sipped on the tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sip, sip. I sipped on the tea.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いい天気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The weather was nice.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weather was nice.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は窓から外を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな日はみんなと遊びたいなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: On a day like this I'd love to be out playing with everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: On a day like this I'd love to be out playing with everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どうして僕はこんなところにいるのだろう？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Why on Earth am I stuck in a place like this right now?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Why on Earth am I stuck in a place like this right now?)

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…暇なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Bored?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Bored?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke abruptly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke abruptly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「暇と言えば暇だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well if you put it like that, I guess I am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well if you put it like that, I guess I am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、二木さんは僕を見ているわけではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked over my shoulder, but Futaki-san wasn't even looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked over my shoulder, but Futaki-san wasn't even looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 名簿をめくりながら、声だけ投げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke without looking up from the documents she was working on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke without looking up from the documents she was working on.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「暇なら、どこか遊びにいけば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you're bored, why not run off and play?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you're bored, why not run off and play?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたはこんなところにいる余裕はないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's really no need for you to be here, is there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's really no need for you to be here, is there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他にいろいろやるべきことがあるはずでしょう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Aren't there some other things you need to be doing...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Aren't there some other things you need to be doing...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 名簿をめくり続ける二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san said this as she continued to gaze at the roster.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san said this as she continued to gaze at the roster.

MESSAGE.JP: 人形みたいな無表情で、精気のない顔した女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: Expressionless like a doll's, the girl's face had no vitality.
MESSAGE.Translation: Expressionless like a doll's, the girl's face had no vitality.

MESSAGE.JP: 外の青空とは隔絶された部屋の風景に沈みこんでいるように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She almost seemed to be sinking in to the scenery of the room that was isolated from the blue sky outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She almost seemed to be sinking in to the scenery of the room that was isolated from the blue sky outside.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「Time is money」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Time is money.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Time is money.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「一瞬の無駄な時間が取り返しのつかないことにもなるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's no way to get back the time you waste, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's no way to get back the time you waste, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ひまひま言う前に部屋を出て行ったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Instead of saying you're bored, why don't you just leave?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Instead of saying you're bored, why don't you just leave?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはどうも僕を追い出したいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she was intent on chasing me out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she was intent on chasing me out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだね。確かにそのとおりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's true. You're absolutely right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's true. You're absolutely right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、邪魔したね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry to have bothered you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry to have bothered you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は寮長室の扉に手を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my hand on the door of the dorm committee room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my hand on the door of the dorm committee room.

MESSAGE.JP: 出る前に振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I left I looked back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I left I looked back.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはひとりで無言のまま書類整理を続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san sat alone, silently paging through the documents.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san sat alone, silently paging through the documents.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「仕事、がんばってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, work hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, work hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 扉を閉めても、返事は聞こえなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after I shut the door I didn't hear a response.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after I shut the door I didn't hear a response.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうわけにもいかないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮長に留守番を頼まれたんだ。勝手に出て行くわけにもいかないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm head asked me to watch the office. I can't just leave...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm head asked me to watch the office. I can't just leave...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私がいるからいいじゃない。それに留守番なんて仕事じゃないでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm here so it'll be fine. And just keeping watch isn't work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm here so it'll be fine. And just keeping watch isn't work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それこそ無責任だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That'd be irresponsible of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That'd be irresponsible of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san raised her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san raised her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮長が帰ってくるまでは、ここにいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Until the dorm head gets back, I'm staying here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Until the dorm head gets back, I'm staying here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あっそ。お好きにどうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I see. Do what you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I see. Do what you wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はちょっと意地になりかけたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I may have come across a bit too stubborn.
MESSAGE.Translation: I may have come across a bit too stubborn.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（でもやることがない…お茶でも淹れようかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But I really have nothing to do... guess I'll make more tea.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But I really have nothing to do... guess I'll make more tea.)

MESSAGE.JP: とぽとぽ。二杯目の緑茶。
MESSAGE.EN: Drip, drip. The second pot of tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Drip, drip. The second pot of tea.

MESSAGE.JP: お茶を口にする。うーん、さりげにおいしいぞ、これ。
MESSAGE.EN: I drank some tea. Hmm, yeah, it really was tasty, this tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drank some tea. Hmm, yeah, it really was tasty, this tea.

MESSAGE.JP: いい匂いだ。どこの産地なのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: It had a great scent. I wonder where it was produced?
MESSAGE.Translation: It had a great scent. I wonder where it was produced?

MESSAGE.JP: …よくわかんないな。あ、付箋が貼ってある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had no idea. Ah, there was something stuck on the package.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had no idea. Ah, there was something stuck on the package.

MESSAGE.JP: 『寮長さんおせわになりました　能美』
MESSAGE.EN: [Thank you for your help -Noumi].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Thank you for your help -Noumi].

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドが買ってきたお茶か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess Kud brought this tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess Kud brought this tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: じゃ、おいしいのも当然だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Then of course it would be delicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then of course it would be delicious.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが僕を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: というかなぜかにらんでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually it was more like she was glaring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually it was more like she was glaring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…別に。なんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Nothing. It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Nothing. It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: What?
MESSAGE.Translation: What?

MESSAGE.JP: あ、自分だけお茶飲んで、とか思っているのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, maybe she's mad that I'm just drinking the tea by myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, maybe she's mad that I'm just drinking the tea by myself...

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子が仕事してるのにのんきにお茶飲んでるってのもどうなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Here I was just sitting back, relaxing and drinking tea while leaving all the work to a girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Here I was just sitting back, relaxing and drinking tea while leaving all the work to a girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんにも淹れてあげよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guessed I should pour her some too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guessed I should pour her some too.

MESSAGE.JP: どれに入れようかな。
MESSAGE.EN: But what should I put it in?
MESSAGE.Translation: But what should I put it in?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん。湯飲み湯飲み…っと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm. Teacups, teacups... ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm. Teacups, teacups... ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あったあった。これかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Here they are. I guess this one?
MESSAGE.Translation: Here they are. I guess this one?

MESSAGE.JP: 湯飲みにはマジックかなにかで『かなちゃんの』と書いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kana-chan's❜ was written on the teacup in magic marker or something.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kana-chan's❜ was written on the teacup in magic marker or something.

MESSAGE.JP: 橙色の変なキャラが描かれた湯飲み。
MESSAGE.EN: The teacup had some strange orange character on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teacup had some strange orange character on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 『（Ｃ）いよかんせいじん』…らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛(C)Iyokan Starmen❜... I guess.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛(C)Iyokan Starmen❜... I guess.

MESSAGE.JP: 伊予柑星人？　変なセンスだな。
MESSAGE.EN: Iyokan Starmen? Weird.
MESSAGE.Translation: Iyokan Starmen? Weird.

MESSAGE.JP: まぁいいか。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, whatever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, whatever.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お茶、淹れたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I poured you some tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I poured you some tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに、いきなり。そんなことしな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What is that, all of the sudden. Who asked you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What is that, all of the sudden. Who asked you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here you go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here you go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その湯飲みをみた二木さんは絶句した。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing the teacup, Futaki-san fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing the teacup, Futaki-san fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、これ二木さんのじゃなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, isn't this yours, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, isn't this yours, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「……違うわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝......No, it isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝......No, it isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうなんだ。でもここに書いてあるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, it isn't? But it's written here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, it isn't? But it's written here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かなちゃん、って二木さんのことだよなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kana-chan❜ meant Futaki-san, didn't it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kana-chan❜ meant Futaki-san, didn't it?

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…私はかなちゃんじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm not Kana-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm not Kana-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも名前、佳奈多じゃなかったっけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I thought your given name was Kanata...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I thought your given name was Kanata...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんで名前知ってるのよ、名乗ったわけじゃないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why do you know my name, it's not like I've ever told you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why do you know my name, it's not like I've ever told you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、名乗ったよ。名乗りまくりだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you've told me. You say it all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you've told me. You say it all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかもフルネームで。
MESSAGE.EN: Her full name, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her full name, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そういえばそうだったわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Now that you mention it, I guess I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Now that you mention it, I guess I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に名乗らなくても知ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you hadn't said it I would know it anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you hadn't said it I would know it anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「風紀委員長の名前ぐらいは知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I at least know the name of the head prefect at my school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I at least know the name of the head prefect at my school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 有名だし。
MESSAGE.EN: She was famous.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was famous.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…悪名とどろいてて悪かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Well excuse my bad reputation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Well excuse my bad reputation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悪名というわけじゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like your reputation is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like your reputation is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でもやっぱり悪名なのかもしれないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: But, well, to be honest I guess it sort of is.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, well, to be honest I guess it sort of is.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そう。別に、いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I see. Well, that's fine then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I see. Well, that's fine then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…とにかく違うから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Regardless, you are mistaken.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Regardless, you are mistaken.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に違うらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it really was the wrong teacup.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it really was the wrong teacup.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。じゃ別のに入れてこよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright. Well I guess I'll use a different one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright. Well I guess I'll use a different one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 窓際まで戻って、紙コップに入れ直す。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to the cupboard, and this time I put it in a paper cup.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to the cupboard, and this time I put it in a paper cup.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは無言で受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san accepted it and drank wordlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san accepted it and drank wordlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もお茶を飲む。
MESSAGE.EN: I also drank from my cup.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also drank from my cup.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おいしいね、このお茶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This tea is pretty good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This tea is pretty good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「クドリャフカのお茶だから当然よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Of course, since it's Kudryavka's tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Of course, since it's Kudryavka's tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 急に黙り込む二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san suddenly fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san suddenly fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「別に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お茶を飲み終えると、僕は言った。
MESSAGE.EN: After I had finished my tea, I asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I had finished my tea, I asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「整理、終わりそう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you done with the paperwork?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you done with the paperwork?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな迷惑そうな顔しないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to look so annoyed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to look so annoyed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「迷惑そう、ではなくて実際迷惑なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't look annoyed. I am annoyed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't look annoyed. I am annoyed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ううっ。とりつく島もない。
MESSAGE.EN: Uuu. She seriously wasn't going to throw me a bone in this conversation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Uuu. She seriously wasn't going to throw me a bone in this conversation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「暇だから手伝うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not doing anything, so let me help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not doing anything, so let me help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はめげずに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't going to give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't going to give up.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ほんとうに暇人ね、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You really do have too much time on your hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You really do have too much time on your hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 実際暇なので、そう言われても腹は立たない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't disagree since it was more or less true.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't disagree since it was more or less true.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それともなんなの？　恩を売りたいのか、なにか下心でもあるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Or is there something else? Are you trying to curry favor, or do you have an ulterior motive?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Or is there something else? Are you trying to curry favor, or do you have an ulterior motive?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや特にはないよ。ほんとうに手伝いたいだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing like that. I really just want to help out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's nothing like that. I really just want to help out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…おひとよしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...How kind-hearted of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...How kind-hearted of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Besides.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Besides.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとりよりふたりのほうが仕事は速く終わると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Two people can get it done faster than one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Two people can get it done faster than one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「手が余っているのにだらだら仕事をするのは非効率じゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's inefficient to work slowly by yourself when there's someone who can help, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's inefficient to work slowly by yourself when there's someone who can help, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「違うかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…このリストに乗ってる生徒。その名簿探して抜き出して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...The students on this list. Find their files and take them out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...The students on this list. Find their files and take them out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事を待っていると、諦めたのか二木さんが書類の束を半分渡してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was waiting for some kind of comeback, but Futaki-san apparently gave up and handed me half the pile of papers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was waiting for some kind of comeback, but Futaki-san apparently gave up and handed me half the pile of papers.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「退学する生徒のリストよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's a list of students dropping out of school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's a list of students dropping out of school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 退学？　穏やかじゃないなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Dropping out? That didn't sound very good.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dropping out? That didn't sound very good.

MESSAGE.JP: まぁ、いいか。僕は席に戻って作業に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, whatever. I went back to my seat and started in on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, whatever. I went back to my seat and started in on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 名簿は、薄い感熱紙の束のせいか、くっついていてめくりづらい。
MESSAGE.EN: The thin sheets of the registry - maybe because they were thermal paper? - stuck together and were hard to flip through.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thin sheets of the registry - maybe because they were thermal paper? - stuck together and were hard to flip through.

MESSAGE.JP: それが３学年分もあるから、探すのも大変だった。
MESSAGE.EN: And there were three years' worth of names, so finding any one was pretty hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there were three years' worth of names, so finding any one was pretty hard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「３年から１年まで。けっこういるんだなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝From third to first year. There's quite a few names here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝From third to first year. There's quite a few names here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然名前も知らないひとばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course I didn't know any of the names.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course I didn't know any of the names.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「経済的な事情がほとんどじゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Most of them left for financial reasons, I believe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Most of them left for financial reasons, I believe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…多いんじゃない、最近は。不況だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I would assume there were many like that, recently. Due to the recession.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I would assume there were many like that, recently. Due to the recession.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かにクラスメイトが不意にいなくなることはある。
MESSAGE.EN: Now that she mentioned it, I did remember several classmates that stopped coming.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now that she mentioned it, I did remember several classmates that stopped coming.

MESSAGE.JP: 噂が流れたりするけれど、結局詳しい理由は知らされることはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There were some rumors, but in the end I never learned the real reason they had left.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were some rumors, but in the end I never learned the real reason they had left.

MESSAGE.JP: 何故って、それは多分僕たちに関係ないことだからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: At any rate, it was probably just none of our business.
MESSAGE.Translation: At any rate, it was probably just none of our business.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、こうやって一覧を見ると、確かにこの学校をやめていく人間はいるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But, looking at this I guess it was a reality that students were leaving this school.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, looking at this I guess it was a reality that students were leaving this school.

MESSAGE.JP: 理由は色々だとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure there were various reasons.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure there were various reasons.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだか、さみしい作業だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This task is kind of depressing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This task is kind of depressing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 書類の束から抜き出された名簿のページたち。
MESSAGE.EN: The pages I had removed from the stack.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pages I had removed from the stack.

MESSAGE.JP: それを見て僕は呟いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured that as I looked at them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured that as I looked at them.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…さみしい、ですって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Depressing, you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Depressing, you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。さみしい。だってほら、一緒の学校にいたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. It's sad. I mean, we were fellow students and all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. It's sad. I mean, we were fellow students and all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いなかったことになってるみたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now it's like they're gone forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now it's like they're gone forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それが、さみしい…、と、思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I think that's... sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I think that's... sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが鼻で笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san sneered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san sneered.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ただの感傷ね、それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're just being sentimental.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're just being sentimental.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰かひとりいなくなっても、多くのひとにとってはどうでもいいことじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Losing one person out of many doesn't have that big of an impact.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Losing one person out of many doesn't have that big of an impact.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「気がつきもしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No one even notices.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No one even notices.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ある人にとって本当にさみしい、と思う人なんか片手で数えるに足るわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝When someone leaves, there will be only a few people who are honestly sad about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝When someone leaves, there will be only a few people who are honestly sad about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなただって、誰だって、それぐらいの人としか深く付き合えないものよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm sure even you can only have so many close friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm sure even you can only have so many close friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それ以上のひとのことなんか、忘れてしまうわ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Everyone else will just be an afterthought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Everyone else will just be an afterthought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなことはないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't think that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't think that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰もが大事とでも言うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So you're saying you should treat everyone as precious?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So you're saying you should treat everyone as precious?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「みんな、覚えていられるって言うのね？　ふぅん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Are you saying you'll remember every person? Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Are you saying you'll remember every person? Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこか馬鹿にしたように二木さんが相槌を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san made an angry sound, as if making fun of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san made an angry sound, as if making fun of me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かに、全部覚えていられるわけはないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course I can't remember all of them, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course I can't remember all of them, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、だからといって誰かがいなくなることが、さみしくないわけはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But that doesn't mean I can't feel sad when someone leaves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But that doesn't mean I can't feel sad when someone leaves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いなくなってもさみしくない、なんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To believe that someone going away isn't sad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To believe that someone going away isn't sad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自分にとって他人がそうなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If that's how you feel about others...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If that's how you feel about others...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「他人にとっての自分もそうかもしれないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's probably how others feel about you as well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's probably how others feel about you as well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなのは嫌だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't stand that thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't stand that thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな考えはそれこそさみしすぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: That way of thinking was just too depressing.
MESSAGE.Translation: That way of thinking was just too depressing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんはそう思わない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Don't you think so, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Don't you think so, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「思わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 即答だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her response was instantaneous.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her response was instantaneous.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は他人に興味ないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have no interest in other people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have no interest in other people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰がどうなっても、知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't care what happens to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't care what happens to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「守るべきものを守ることができたのならあとはどうでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝As long as I can protect what I need to, nothing else matters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝As long as I can protect what I need to, nothing else matters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とんとん、と抜き出したページを揃える仕草。
MESSAGE.EN: She gathered up the pages she had taken out and tapped them on the table to organize them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gathered up the pages she had taken out and tapped them on the table to organize them.

MESSAGE.JP: ばさり。
MESSAGE.EN: Rustle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rustle.

MESSAGE.JP: シュレッダーの前まで行くと、二木さんはページを落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san went to the shredder, and dropped the pages in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san went to the shredder, and dropped the pages in.

MESSAGE.JP: がー、という音と共に、ページは切り刻まれていく。
MESSAGE.EN: With a loud mechanical growl the pages were torn to shreds.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a loud mechanical growl the pages were torn to shreds.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰かいなくなっても、誰も気がつかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No one cares when someone leaves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No one cares when someone leaves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「イスカールナリみたいにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Like the Old Emperors in the Neverending Story, who used up all their memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Like the Old Emperors in the Neverending Story, who used up all their memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そっちのほうが、気が楽でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That way of thinking is easier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That way of thinking is easier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いなくなる度に感傷的になっていたら身が持たないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I can't afford to get all sentimental every single time somebody leaves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I can't afford to get all sentimental every single time somebody leaves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 退学した生徒のページが紙くずになるのを見ながら、二木さんは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san said that as she watched the papers of the students who left become ribbons.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san said that as she watched the papers of the students who left become ribbons.

MESSAGE.JP: 冷たくて感情のこもらない乾いた声で。
MESSAGE.EN: Her dry voice did nothing to hide her coldness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her dry voice did nothing to hide her coldness.

MESSAGE.JP: シュレッダーが紙を裁断する音だけが、部屋に響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The only other sound in the room was the loud growl of the shredder devouring the paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only other sound in the room was the loud growl of the shredder devouring the paper.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…ただいまー。あら、二木さん、おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...I'm back. Oh, Futaki-san, thanks for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...I'm back. Oh, Futaki-san, thanks for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「おつかれさまです、あーちゃん先輩」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Thank you for your hard work, A-chan-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Thank you for your hard work, A-chan-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「直枝くんもおつかれ。あ、名簿整理やってくれた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help as well, Naoe-kun. Ah, were you sorting through the student roster?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help as well, Naoe-kun. Ah, were you sorting through the student roster?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はい。終わりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yes. We finished with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yes. We finished with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「じゃー、ちょうどいいわ、学食のおばさま方からマフィンを貰ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Well, that's perfect. I actually got some muffins from the lunch ladies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Well, that's perfect. I actually got some muffins from the lunch ladies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二人とも一緒に食べましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Why don't we eat them together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Why don't we eat them together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「遠慮しておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 席を立ち上がると、鞄だけ持って二木さんは教室を出ようとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing up from her desk, Futaki-san took her bag and made as if to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing up from her desk, Futaki-san took her bag and made as if to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うん？　やっぱり食べる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Oh? You going to have some after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Oh? You going to have some after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「甘いものは好きじゃないんです。いい加減覚えてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't enjoy sweet things. Please remember that already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't enjoy sweet things. Please remember that already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言い捨てて二木さんは扉の向こうに消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: With that parting remark, Futaki-san disappeared through the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that parting remark, Futaki-san disappeared through the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…うーん。やれやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Hmmm. What a handful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Hmmm. What a handful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は苦笑している。
MESSAGE.EN: The female dorm head smiled bitterly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The female dorm head smiled bitterly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「怒ってるんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if she's angry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if she's angry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そういうわけじゃないんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I don't think that's the case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I don't think that's the case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一言多いですよね、二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san is very blunt, isn't she.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san is very blunt, isn't she.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Hmmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Hmmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり苦笑する寮長。
MESSAGE.EN: The Dorm Head's smile was still bitter.
MESSAGE.Translation: The Dorm Head's smile was still bitter.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「それにはノーコメント、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝No comment there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝No comment there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ところで、直枝くんと二人で食べるのもなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝So it looks like the two of us will be eating all of these, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝So it looks like the two of us will be eating all of these, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…恭介呼んできましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Maybe we should call Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Maybe we should call Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あら、嬉しい。…なんてね。そんな顔しないの、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, that would be wonderful... Just kidding. No need to make that face, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Oh, that would be wonderful... Just kidding. No need to make that face, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長がくすくす笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head laughed quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head laughed quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんな顔ですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What face would that be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What face would that be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: からかわれていることに気がついて僕は赤面した。
MESSAGE.EN: When I realized she was making fun of me, I turned red.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I realized she was making fun of me, I turned red.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あなたはあなたの魅力があるんじゃないのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I guess you're charming in your own way, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I guess you're charming in your own way, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「それはそれとして、全部あげるから、ルームメイトくんと食べて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Well let's leave it at that, I'll give them all to you. Share them with your roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Well let's leave it at that, I'll give them all to you. Share them with your roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, is that alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, is that alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「いいのいいの。彼にはカロリーが必要でしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's fine, it's fine. He looks like he might need some calories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's fine, it's fine. He looks like he might need some calories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「今日はおつかれさま。あとは私がやるから、帰っていいわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for today. I'll finish the rest, so you head on home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for today. I'll finish the rest, so you head on home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうですか…わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh... alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh... alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「マフィン、ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for the muffins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for the muffins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はお礼を言って、寮長室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I said my thanks and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said my thanks and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yaawn～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yaawn～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「でけぇあくびだなぁ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That was one giant yawn, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That was one giant yawn, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「寝付きでも悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Having trouble sleeping?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Having trouble sleeping?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ブリッジしながら布団に入るとちょうど疲れた頃にうまく寝れたぜ？　お薦めだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did you know if you do a bridge exercise on your bed it'll tire you out and put you right to sleep? I recommend it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did you know if you do a bridge exercise on your bed it'll tire you out and put you right to sleep? I recommend it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気持ち悪いよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That'd be messed up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That'd be messed up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと疲れてるだけで…あれ、恭介だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just a little tired... huh, it's Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just a little tired... huh, it's Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん？　ほんとだな、なにやってんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm? Ah, yeah it is, what's he doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm? Ah, yeah it is, what's he doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭で恭介が誰かと話している。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was talking with someone in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was talking with someone in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: …相手は二木さんのようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was talking to Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was talking to Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いつもあなたは回りくどいやり方ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You have a roundabout way of doing things, as always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You have a roundabout way of doing things, as always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「試行錯誤の連続と言ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Call it a continued process of trial and error, please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Call it a continued process of trial and error, please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんな迂遠なことをしなくても、あなたなら簡単なことでは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You don't need this plan of yours to accomplish what you want, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You don't need this plan of yours to accomplish what you want, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何もかも思うまま動かすことができるわけじゃないんだよ、俺は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like everything always works out the way I want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's not like everything always works out the way I want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうだか。好きにしたらいいじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you say so. But I think you should just do whatever you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you say so. But I think you should just do whatever you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それにこういうときだけ頼むなんてどうかしてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And the fact that you always ask for these kinds of favors is rather off-putting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And the fact that you always ask for these kinds of favors is rather off-putting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「手厳しいな、二木は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're a harsh one, Futaki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're a harsh one, Futaki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたにだけではありませんよ、棗先輩」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Not just to you, Natsume-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Not just to you, Natsume-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰にでもです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝To everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝To everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…誰に対しても、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...No matter who it is, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...No matter who it is, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それが疑わしいと言いたいかのように、恭介は二木さんをじっと見つめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke said that in a doubtful tone, looking straight at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke said that in a doubtful tone, looking straight at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 微かに二木さんが怯む。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san shied away from him a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san shied away from him a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…は、話はそれだけですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Is, is that all you wanted to talk about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Is, is that all you wanted to talk about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな。とりあえずはな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. For now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. For now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…失礼します。棗先輩」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Excuse me then. Natsume-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Excuse me then. Natsume-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「珍しい物を見たぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That was strange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That was strange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごい意外な組み合わせのような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like those two were the strangest combination I could think of.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like those two were the strangest combination I could think of.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何の話なんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What were they talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What were they talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「訊いてみたらいいんじゃねーか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why not just ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why not just ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それもそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手を振って、恭介を呼ぶことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Waving my hand, I called out to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Waving my hand, I called out to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹か。おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah it's Riki. Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah it's Riki. Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう、恭介。二木さんと何を話してたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Kyousuke. What were you talking to Futaki-san about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Kyousuke. What were you talking to Futaki-san about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あぁ、部室の件だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ahh, it was about our clubroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ahh, it was about our clubroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、まだ決着ついてなかったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, that hasn't been decided yet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, that hasn't been decided yet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんなが頑張ってくれてるおかげで、もう一押しと言ったところだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks to everyone, just a little more should do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks to everyone, just a little more should do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「二木に、同好会の連中の取りまとめを頼んでいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I asked Futaki to arrange things with all the folks who were in agreement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I asked Futaki to arrange things with all the folks who were in agreement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして二木さんに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「運動部会の事務作業もやってるからな、二木は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Because Futaki's doing clerical work for the sports clubs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Because Futaki's doing clerical work for the sports clubs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, she is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, she is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「剣道部員だしなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Since she's a member of the kendo club...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Since she's a member of the kendo club...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「女子剣道部員のまとめ役やってる関係で、部会でも顔が広いんだよな二木は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Actually she's popular even among the sports clubs, since she helped put together the female kendo team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Actually she's popular even among the sports clubs, since she helped put together the female kendo team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ理樹、そんなハトが腕相撲食らったような顔して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, Riki, you look like you just saw a pigeon swallow a sumo wrestler.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, Riki, you look like you just saw a pigeon swallow a sumo wrestler.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレが剣道部のことを知っているのは謙吾に勝つために女子部員にまで弱点を訊いて回ろうとか考えている姑息な筋肉馬鹿で今日も幸せそうですね、とでも言いたげだなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't joke about me being my happy muscle idiot self and going around asking female kendo club members about Kengo's weaknesses so I could beat him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't joke about me being my happy muscle idiot self and going around asking female kendo club members about Kengo's weaknesses so I could beat him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No no no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No no no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、そうか。じゃ、謙吾とも話したりするのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I see. I wonder if she talks with Kengo too then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I see. I wonder if she talks with Kengo too then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それは知らねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I have no idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I have no idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知らないんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の顔を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介も首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: He shook his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: He shook his head.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「同じ部だから知ってはいるだろうが、親しくはないんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well they're in the same club so I guess they know each other, but I doubt they'd be good friends, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well they're in the same club so I guess they know each other, but I doubt they'd be good friends, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「二木は途中で幽霊部員と化したようだし。謙吾と二木が仲が良いかどうかは知らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Futaki suddenly became a ghost member along the way. I don't know if she and Kengo get along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Futaki suddenly became a ghost member along the way. I don't know if she and Kengo get along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕らが知らない人間関係もあるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess there are always relationships between people you don't know about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess there are always relationships between people you don't know about.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹からも二木に頼んでみてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You should ask Futaki-san to help too, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You should ask Futaki-san to help too, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった…でも、僕の言うこと、二木さんは聞いてくれるかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I will... but, I wonder if Futaki-san will even listen to what I say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I will... but, I wonder if Futaki-san will even listen to what I say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それもミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's part of the mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's part of the mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして部室を守るためのな、と恭介は付け足す。
MESSAGE.EN: And, Kyousuke added, it was for the sake of protecting the clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, Kyousuke added, it was for the sake of protecting the clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、やってみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true. I'll try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true. I'll try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレも筋肉関係を当ってみるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And I'm gonna try my muscle-related connections.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And I'm gonna try my muscle-related connections.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「期待してるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm counting on you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm counting on you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おうよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You bet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You bet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「って理樹かよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So you meant Riki!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So you meant Riki!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まぁまぁ、真人。真人も頑張ろうよ、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝C, calm down, Masato. You should do your best too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝C, calm down, Masato. You should do your best too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいけどさ…馬鹿にすんなよ筋肉を？　いつか役に立ちまくりだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well that's fine... but aren't you making light of muscles? They'll come in handy one day, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well that's fine... but aren't you making light of muscles? They'll come in handy one day, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと拗ねてしまった真人をなだめながら、僕たちは教室へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: While soothing the sulky Masato, we headed back to our classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: While soothing the sulky Masato, we headed back to our classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、ＨＲが終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Alright, homeroom was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Alright, homeroom was over.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日の授業は終了だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's the end of today's classes.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's the end of today's classes.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ヘイ、ガールズ。今日も元気かい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey girls. Feeling good today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey girls. Feeling good today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鈴さん、髪の毛に糸くずが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, there's some fluff in your hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, there's some fluff in your hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うにゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Unya?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Unya?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、取れました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Alright, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Alright, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…う、あ、ありがと、みお」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Uu, th, thanks, Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Uu, th, thanks, Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえいえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「元気かーい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Feeling gooooood?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Feeling gooooood?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さて、本を読みましょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Now then, I guess I'll go back to reading...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Now then, I guess I'll go back to reading...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「げ・ん・き・かーいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝F-E-E-L-I-N-G GOOOOOOD?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝F-E-E-L-I-N-G GOOOOOOD?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「はるか、うるさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Haruka, you're too noisy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Haruka, you're too noisy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「静かにしてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please be quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please be quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なぜそういうことだけ一致して私に言うの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why is it you both only sync up when you're saying that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why is it you both only sync up when you're saying that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しょぼーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Glooooooom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Glooooooom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「冗談ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was just a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was just a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ざっくり傷ついたですヨ、みおちん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝But it cut me right to the bone, Mio-chin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝But it cut me right to the bone, Mio-chin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あんまり冷たくするともう片方に浮気しちゃうぞー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you treat me too coldly, I'll totally cheat with your other half...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you treat me too coldly, I'll totally cheat with your other half...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「冷たくなくて明るい美魚ちんに浮気しちゃうぞー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Not the cold one, I'll cheat with the Mio-chin that's all happy and not icy at all... ❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Not the cold one, I'll cheat with the Mio-chin that's all happy and not icy at all... ❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうぞ勝手にしてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please do whatever you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please do whatever you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「にゃーっ。はるか、くっつくなーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nyaaa. Haruka, don't cling to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nyaaa. Haruka, don't cling to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわーん、鈴ちゃんかまってー。かまってー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaaaan, Rin-chan, care for me～. Care for me～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaaaan, Rin-chan, care for me～. Care for me～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も鈴たちは賑やかだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like Rin and the girls were lively today as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like Rin and the girls were lively today as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの声を聞きながら、鞄に教科書をつめて立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I arranged my textbooks in my bag while listening to Haruka-san's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arranged my textbooks in my bag while listening to Haruka-san's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: ミッション継続のため、寮長室へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: To continue with the mission, I headed for the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: To continue with the mission, I headed for the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「失礼します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwahh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwahh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段ボール箱を抱えた二木さんが目の前にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san appeared in front of me, holding a cardboard box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san appeared in front of me, holding a cardboard box.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「……ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝......Haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝......Haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで来たのよ、みたいな目で見ないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please don't look at me with that ❛Why'd you come here❜ face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please don't look at me with that ❛Why'd you come here❜ face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんで来たのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why did you come here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why did you come here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 訊いてきた!?
MESSAGE.EN: She actually asked it!?
MESSAGE.Translation: She actually asked it!?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だから寮会の手伝いをしにきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I already told you I'm helping out the dorm council.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I already told you I'm helping out the dorm council.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ふーん。そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hmmm. Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hmmm. Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yes it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yes it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長室には二木さん以外、誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was the only one in the dorm heads' room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was the only one in the dorm heads' room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮長は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where are the dorm heads?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where are the dorm heads?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは段ボール箱を書棚に押し込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was stuffing the cardboard box onto a bookshelf.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was stuffing the cardboard box onto a bookshelf.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…誰に訊いてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Who are you asking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Who are you asking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この部屋には二木さんしかいないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no one here besides you, Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no one here besides you, Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「わからないわよ。そこに透明人間みたいなのがいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You never know. There could be an invisible man standing over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You never know. There could be an invisible man standing over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じーっ、ぼーっ、がーっ、と見てるかもしれないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝He could be staring at us, like ❛Jiiiiii❜ or ❛Bouuuuu❜ or ❛Gaaaaaaa.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝He could be staring at us, like ❛Jiiiiii❜ or ❛Bouuuuu❜ or ❛Gaaaaaaa.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことあるわけないでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I seriously doubt there's anyone like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I seriously doubt there's anyone like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それに、がーっ、と見るってなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, I know ❛jii❜ and ❛bou❜ are SFX for staring at something, but what the hell is ❛gaaaa❜ supposed to be?
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, I know ❛jii❜ and ❛bou❜ are SFX for staring at something, but what the hell is ❛gaaaa❜ supposed to be?

MESSAGE.JP: 意味がわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't get it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いきなり変なこと言わないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please don't say such weird things all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please don't say such weird things all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん？　なんだか既視感のあるやりとりだな。
MESSAGE.EN: Hm? I suddenly got a sense of deja vu.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hm? I suddenly got a sense of deja vu.

MESSAGE.JP: 鼻で笑われた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She snickered....
MESSAGE.Translation: She snickered....

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん、その鼻で笑うくせやめたほうがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, you really should stop snickering at people like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, you really should stop snickering at people like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「感じ悪いし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It gives off a bad vibe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It gives off a bad vibe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「感じ良くしようと思ってないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It wasn't my intention to make you feel good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It wasn't my intention to make you feel good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そういう問題じゃなくってね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not really the problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not really the problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「普通にしてればいいのに、なんでそんなとげとげしいのかな、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was just wondering why you had to make it sound so wicked, instead of just laughing normally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was just wondering why you had to make it sound so wicked, instead of just laughing normally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「余計なお世話よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's none of your concern.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's none of your concern.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたに愛想良くすると何かメリットがあるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And what do I have to gain by treating you with respect?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And what do I have to gain by treating you with respect?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや特にはない気がするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess nothing really when you put it like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess nothing really when you put it like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「じゃしなくてもいいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Then I shouldn't need to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Then I shouldn't need to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はいいけど…二木さん自身が評判悪くなるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't care either way, but... Futaki-san, it hurts your reputation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't care either way, but... Futaki-san, it hurts your reputation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お節介なひとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're quite the busybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're quite the busybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にらまれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was glaring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was glaring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はそういう性格なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's just how I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's just how I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうだったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I suppose that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I suppose that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …納得されてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She agreed with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She agreed with me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、何をしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、僕、何か変なこと言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, did I say something weird?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, did I say something weird?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何やってるかわからないぐらいなら、足手まといだから出て行ったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If you don't even understand what I'm doing, you're just going to be a burden, so how about leaving?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If you don't even understand what I'm doing, you're just going to be a burden, so how about leaving?❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり追い出したがっているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she was really trying her best to chase me away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she was really trying her best to chase me away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだね。そうするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I guess you're right. I'll leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I guess you're right. I'll leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 扉に手をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached for the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached for the door.

MESSAGE.JP: がらり。
MESSAGE.EN: It opened with a clatter.
MESSAGE.Translation: It opened with a clatter.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろを見ると、二木さんは段ボールを再び書棚に押し込もうとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back, I saw that Futaki-san was cramming cardboard boxes onto the shelves again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back, I saw that Futaki-san was cramming cardboard boxes onto the shelves again.

MESSAGE.JP: 関わらないでくれ、と言われているのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to me like she was silently telling me not to get involved.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to me like she was silently telling me not to get involved.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそう思いながら、部屋を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: With that thought, I left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that thought, I left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「書棚整理しているんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're sorting the stuff on the bookshelves, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're sorting the stuff on the bookshelves, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「重そうだから、手伝うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That looks heavy, let me help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That looks heavy, let me help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「別に手伝って貰わなくてもいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You really don't need to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You really don't need to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日の仕事はこれだけなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is this all the work for today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is this all the work for today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そこの机。何かの日誌があるけど。書かなくていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝On the desk over there... looks like a journal or logbook. Don't you need to write that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝On the desk over there... looks like a journal or logbook. Don't you need to write that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「立ってるものは、猫でも使えっていうでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If someone volunteers, don't look a gift cat in the mouth, they say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If someone volunteers, don't look a gift cat in the mouth, they say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「合理的な判断だと、思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's pretty rational.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's pretty rational.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは眉をしかめている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was scowling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was scowling.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そことそこの段ボール。全部書棚入れて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Those boxes, and those. They all need to go on the shelves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Those boxes, and those. They all need to go on the shelves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった。これだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it. These, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it. These, right?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷く二木さんは、座って日誌を書き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san nodded, then sat down and started writing in the journal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san nodded, then sat down and started writing in the journal.

MESSAGE.JP: 合理的とか効率的という言葉に弱いのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she was weak against the words ❛rational❜ and ❛efficient.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she was weak against the words ❛rational❜ and ❛efficient.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんらしいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: That's just like her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's just like her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よいしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 十個前後あった段ボールを全部書棚に入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hoisted the ten or so cardboard boxes onto the bookshelves.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hoisted the ten or so cardboard boxes onto the bookshelves.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、おしまい、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, that should do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, that should do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕をぐるぐる振り回す。
MESSAGE.EN: I flexed my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flexed my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ、意外と疲れていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh, I actually wasn't that tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh, I actually wasn't that tired.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の腕をつついてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at my own arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at my own arm.

MESSAGE.JP: 筋肉ついてる…のだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I starting to grow... muscle?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I starting to grow... muscle?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかんないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まぁ真人に報告したら喜んでくれるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure Masato would be overjoyed if I told him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure Masato would be overjoyed if I told him.

MESSAGE.JP: 知らず知らずのうちに鍛えられているのだとしたら、真人に感謝しなくっちゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: It had grown little by little without me knowing. I guess I'd have Masato to thank for that.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had grown little by little without me knowing. I guess I'd have Masato to thank for that.

MESSAGE.JP: 感謝祭を開いてもいいぐらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe we could hold a big party to thank him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe we could hold a big party to thank him.

MESSAGE.JP: マッスルカーニバルというのはどうだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe something like a Muscle Carnival?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe something like a Muscle Carnival?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「きんにく、きんにく！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Muscle, muscle!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Muscle, muscle!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「きんにく、きんにく！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Muscle, muscle!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Muscle, muscle!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何故か真人とクドが僕の周りをそんな風に踊っている光景が脳裏に浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason the image of Kud and Masato dancing around like that played in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason the image of Kud and Masato dancing around like that played in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 謎だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a mystery.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a mystery.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんがじっと僕を見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…腕フェチ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...So you have an arm fetish?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...So you have an arm fetish?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ち、違うよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「最悪ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちが、違うよっ、ちょっと筋肉がついてるかなって思っただけでっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no that's not it. I was just thinking I've started growing some muscle, is all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no that's not it. I was just thinking I've started growing some muscle, is all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…最悪ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You're horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You're horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ２度目言われた!?
MESSAGE.EN: She said it twice!?
MESSAGE.Translation: She said it twice!?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は腕フェチじゃないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't have an arm fetish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't have an arm fetish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたが何フェチだろうと、関係ないからいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't really care what fetishes you have, so it doesn't matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't really care what fetishes you have, so it doesn't matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「仕事しなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just get back to work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just get back to work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全部入れたんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I already put them all in, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I already put them all in, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「え、もう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Eh, already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Eh, already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。ほら、見てよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Here, look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Here, look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「終わってるでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's it, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's it, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次は何をやればいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I do next?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I do next?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「帰れば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How about leaving?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How about leaving?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…みもふたもないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well that was blunt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well that was blunt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「帰る以外にだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How about something besides leaving?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How about something besides leaving?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「お茶でも飲んでなさいよ。暇そうにしながら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How about you just sit around and drink some tea? Be sure to look like you're doing nothing while you are at it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How about you just sit around and drink some tea? Be sure to look like you're doing nothing while you are at it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それしか暇潰しをする方法を知らないかのように間抜け面晒してお茶飲んでなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just sit there and drink tea like a fool who knows of no other way to pass the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just sit there and drink tea like a fool who knows of no other way to pass the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「暇な時間をどう使ったらいいかわからない無趣味な人間のごとくお茶すすってなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just lounge there and sip on your tea like a dullard who doesn't know how to spend his free time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just lounge there and sip on your tea like a dullard who doesn't know how to spend his free time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess I'll do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess I'll do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 実際少し喉が渇いていたので、お茶を淹れることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: My throat really was a little dry, so I went to make some tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: My throat really was a little dry, so I went to make some tea.

MESSAGE.JP: 電気ポットの周りには、伏せてない湯飲みがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Around the electric pot there were some uncovered teacups.
MESSAGE.Translation: Around the electric pot there were some uncovered teacups.

MESSAGE.JP: 飲みかけのものあるから、さっきまで誰かが使っていたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Some of them still had tea in them, so I guess someone had just been using them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some of them still had tea in them, so I guess someone had just been using them.

MESSAGE.JP: その一つに目がとまる。
MESSAGE.EN: My eye fell on one of them in particular.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eye fell on one of them in particular.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あの変な湯飲みだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It's that strange teacup...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It's that strange teacup...)

MESSAGE.JP: かなちゃんの、と書いてある湯飲み。
MESSAGE.EN: The one with ❛Kana-chan❜ written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one with ❛Kana-chan❜ written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず紙コップに冷蔵庫から取りだしたお茶を注ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I just got some tea from the fridge and poured it into a paper cup.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I just got some tea from the fridge and poured it into a paper cup.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（誰のなんだろうなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Just whose cup is that?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Just whose cup is that?)

MESSAGE.JP: お茶を飲みながら考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought of that while I drank the tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought of that while I drank the tea.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん、何か入れようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, did you want anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, did you want anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…別にいいわ。さっき紅茶飲んだから。喉乾いてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'm fine. I was just drinking some black tea earlier. I'm not thirsty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'm fine. I was just drinking some black tea earlier. I'm not thirsty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …変な湯飲みの脇に置いてあるのは、紅茶のティーパックじゃないのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I glanced at the strange teacup, and wasn't that a black tea bag sticking out of it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I glanced at the strange teacup, and wasn't that a black tea bag sticking out of it?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ、二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なによ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この湯飲みって、やっぱり二木さんのじゃ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure this teacup isn't y...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure this teacup isn't y...

MESSAGE.JP: うわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: Uwaaah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwaaah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いきなりずかずかとやってきた二木さんは、湯飲みを取り上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san suddenly shoved her way over and grabbed the teacup from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san suddenly shoved her way over and grabbed the teacup from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓をがらり、と開け、手のひらを翻す。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened the window with a rattle and poured the cup out out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened the window with a rattle and poured the cup out out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 湯飲みに残っていた液体（多分紅茶だろう）が、ぱしゃりと地面に落ちる音。
MESSAGE.EN: The liquid (I guessed it was black tea) left in the cup could be heard splashing to the ground below.
MESSAGE.Translation: The liquid (I guessed it was black tea) left in the cup could be heard splashing to the ground below.

MESSAGE.JP: と同時に、ほわあという声が聞こえたような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, I thought I heard a surprised 'Howaa' exclamation from below.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, I thought I heard a surprised 'Howaa' exclamation from below.

MESSAGE.JP: がらがら、ぴしゃん。
MESSAGE.EN: She slammed the window shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slammed the window shut.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, it isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, it isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がん！　布巾の上に伏せて湯飲みを置き、また机に戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She then set the teacup down on a napkin with a loud clang and returned to the desk.
