MESSAGE.Translation: She then set the teacup down on a napkin with a loud clang and returned to the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（いや、どうみても二木さんのだよね、その反応…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Um, with a reaction like that there's no way it isn't hers...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Um, with a reaction like that there's no way it isn't hers...)

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「は～、疲れた、疲れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Haa～, so tired, so tired.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Haa～, so tired, so tired.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がら、と扉が開く音と同時に寮長が入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was the sound of the door opening, and the dorm head appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was the sound of the door opening, and the dorm head appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「今日もわたし、がんばったーっ。あら、直枝くん。いらっしゃい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I did my best today yet again. Oh, Naoe-kun. Welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I did my best today yet again. Oh, Naoe-kun. Welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おつかれさまです、寮長」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for your hard work, Dorm Head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for your hard work, Dorm Head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「かなちゃんもお疲れさまー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help too, Kana-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help too, Kana-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「かなちゃん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kana-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kana-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うん。かなちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Yep. Kana-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Yep. Kana-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: びし、と二木さんを指差す寮長。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head pointed her finger at Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head pointed her finger at Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはいらいらと赤ペンで日誌を叩いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was tapping a red pen against the journal in irritation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was tapping a red pen against the journal in irritation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（うわぁ…青筋浮かんでる…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Uwaah... There's a vein popping out on her forehead...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Uwaah... There's a vein popping out on her forehead...)

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ん、どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、その、なんというか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well, how should I put this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well, how should I put this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あーちゃん先輩っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝A-chan-senpai!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝A-chan-senpai!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「は、はい！　ってなに、二木さん、大声だして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Y, yes! Wait, why are you suddenly yelling like that, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Y, yes! Wait, why are you suddenly yelling like that, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そんな風に呼ばないで、って言いませんでしたか、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Didn't I tell you not to call me by that name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Didn't I tell you not to call me by that name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「そうだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Did you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Did you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうですっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Yes I did!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Yes I did!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Hmmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Hmmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「思い出せないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I can't seem to recall that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I can't seem to recall that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ごめんねぇ、最近物忘れが激しくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, I'm just so forgetful these days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, I'm just so forgetful these days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「どうしてか知らないけど毎日色々なことを忘れちゃうのよねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'm not sure why, but it seems I forget quite a few things every day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'm not sure why, but it seems I forget quite a few things every day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「繰り返して治らないのは、もうそういうものなのよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'm sure I've done it so many times by now that it's already beyond curing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'm sure I've done it so many times by now that it's already beyond curing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今朝も言ったじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I believe I reminded you again this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I believe I reminded you again this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ごめんごめん。かなちゃん怒らないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, sorry. Don't get angry, Kana-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, sorry. Don't get angry, Kana-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「言うそばから、なんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And so you immediately say it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And so you immediately say it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ごめんね、直枝くん。昨日お気に入りのお茶が無くなっちゃったらしくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, Naoe-kun. It seems we ran out of her favorite tea, yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sorry, Naoe-kun. It seems we ran out of her favorite tea, yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「一杯分しか飲めなかった、って怒ってたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝She was only able to drink one cup, so she got angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝She was only able to drink one cup, so she got angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「だから今日はずーっとご機嫌斜めで。困った子だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝And that's why she's been in a mood all day today. Such a difficult child.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝And that's why she's been in a mood all day today. Such a difficult child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それで昨日僕をにらんでいたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess that's why she was glaring at me yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess that's why she was glaring at me yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「能美さんのお茶、だったせいかしらね。それはもうすごい怒りようで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I suppose it was because it was Noumi-san's tea. She got really upset about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I suppose it was because it was Noumi-san's tea. She got really upset about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「直枝くんにだいぶ悪態ついてたのよ。心配してたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝She was saying some really horrible things about you, Naoe-kun. I was very worried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝She was saying some really horrible things about you, Naoe-kun. I was very worried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「仲良くやってるようで安心したわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But it looks like you're getting along well, what a relief.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But it looks like you're getting along well, what a relief.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Tch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Tch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がたん。
MESSAGE.EN: Wham.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wham.

MESSAGE.JP: 椅子から立ち上がった二木さんは、無言で部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san stood up from her chair and wordlessly left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san stood up from her chair and wordlessly left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…出ていっちゃいましたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長はくすくす笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head laughed softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head laughed softly.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「うふふっ…意外と親しみやすいでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Hehe... she's friendlier than she looks, isn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Hehe... she's friendlier than she looks, isn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…まぁ、その、わかりやすいですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I guess... she's easy to read...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I guess... she's easy to read...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled bitterly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled bitterly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、一応書棚整理みたいなのしてたんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I finished doing what I think was organizing the bookshelves...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I finished doing what I think was organizing the bookshelves...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「他に何か仕事ないですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was there any other work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was there any other work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…特にはないかな。今日もありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...Not really. Thanks for coming by again today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...Not really. Thanks for coming by again today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「明日もよろしくねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'll see you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'll see you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長に挨拶をして、寮の部屋に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After saying goodbye to the dorm head, I headed back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After saying goodbye to the dorm head, I headed back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはようー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君おはよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Good morning Riki-kun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Good morning Riki-kun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんたちに挨拶をしながら鞄を机に置く。
MESSAGE.EN: I set my bag on my desk while greeting the girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set my bag on my desk while greeting the girls.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日もいい天気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was another beautiful day.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was another beautiful day.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それで、昨日空からお茶が降ってきたんだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Anyway, yesterday some tea fell from the sky!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Anyway, yesterday some tea fell from the sky!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは不思議なこともあるのですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This world is certainly full of mysterious happenings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This world is certainly full of mysterious happenings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日の二木さんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if the cause had been Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if the cause had been Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんがとばっちりを受けたようだけど、黙っておくことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I bet Komari-san had been hit by the tea Futaki-san had poured out the window, but I kept quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I bet Komari-san had been hit by the tea Futaki-san had poured out the window, but I kept quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: ともかく、今日も一日頑張ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, time to do my best again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, time to do my best again today.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、りんちゃん、ゆいちゃん。おはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, Rin-chan, Yui-chan. Good morning!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, Rin-chan, Yui-chan. Good morning!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おはよう、こまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Morning, Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Morning, Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、ゆいちゃんと呼ぶのは止めるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, it'd be great if you stopped calling me Yui-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, it'd be great if you stopped calling me Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…あれ？　はるちゃんどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Hmm? What's wrong, Haru-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Hmm? What's wrong, Haru-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんに背中を押されるようにして、葉留佳さんが入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san entered right behind Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san entered right behind Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃんおはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Good morning Haru-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Good morning Haru-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やは、おはよー、こまりん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yaha, mornin,' Komarin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yaha, mornin,' Komarin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃん、元気ないよー。ほら、元気よくー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haru-chan, you look blue-. Here, cheer up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haru-chan, you look blue-. Here, cheer up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おはよー。にこにこ笑っておはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Good morning. Smiley smiley good morning～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Good morning. Smiley smiley good morning～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは葉留佳さんと来ヶ谷さんの手を取ってぶんぶん振り回している。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san took Haruka-san and Kurugaya-san's hands and shook them up and down while repeating that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san took Haruka-san and Kurugaya-san's hands and shook them up and down while repeating that.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「こらこら、小毬君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hey now, Komari-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hey now, Komari-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「引っ張りすぎると私たちの上着が伸びるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you tug too much you'll stretch out our uniform sleeves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you tug too much you'll stretch out our uniform sleeves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ！　小毬さんそれは私のスカートですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Komari-san, that's my skirt!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Komari-san, that's my skirt!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふぇぇっ！　クーちゃんごめんねーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fueee! Sorry, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fueee! Sorry, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に賑々しいなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: They certainly were lively.
MESSAGE.Translation: They certainly were lively.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおー、今日も騒がしいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Woah, they're noisy again today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Woah, they're noisy again today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「毎朝毎朝飽きねぇ連中だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝They never seem to tire of doing this every morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝They never seem to tire of doing this every morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女の子が騒いでる中って入りづらい時があるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's hard to approach the girls when they're all making a ruckus together like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's hard to approach the girls when they're all making a ruckus together like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そーだなー。女同士の空気つーか、よくわかんねぇけど。そんな感じのな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I know, right? It's like there's this girliness in the air, or something. Anyway, I feel that way too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I know, right? It's like there's this girliness in the air, or something. Anyway, I feel that way too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、逆もしかりだけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, the same goes for guys too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, the same goes for guys too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、理樹。オレたちは授業始まるまで転がる勢いで遊ぼうぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, Riki. Lets have some tumbling practice before class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, Riki. Lets have some tumbling practice before class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「予習しなくちゃダメだよ真人。後、小毬さんたちより、それ騒がしいですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to get ready for class, Masato. Also, that would make more noise than Komari-san's bunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to get ready for class, Masato. Also, that would make more noise than Komari-san's bunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば宿題なかったっけ？　１時間目、数学だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Also don't you have your homework? Today's first period is math.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Also don't you have your homework? Today's first period is math.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うっ。そ、そうだったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uuu. R, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uuu. R, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだよ。ほら、真人。手伝ってあげるから、やろう？　ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes really. Here, Masato. I'll help you out, so let's do it? Okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes really. Here, Masato. I'll help you out, so let's do it? Okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「う、ううう…写させてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝U, uuuu... lemme copy it please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝U, uuuu... lemme copy it please...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいはい。しょうがないなぁもう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, alright. You're so hopeless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, alright. You're so hopeless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さすが理樹さまあぁぁ…一生恩に着ます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's my Riki-samaaaa... You have my eternal gratitude...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's my Riki-samaaaa... You have my eternal gratitude...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっと、ここぞというところで恩に着てよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you should save your eternal gratitude for more important things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you should save your eternal gratitude for more important things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はノートを開きながら苦笑したのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave a bitter smile as I opened my notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave a bitter smile as I opened my notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムがなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The school chime rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school chime rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 午前の授業はおしまいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all for morning classes.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all for morning classes.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うし、終わった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, it's over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, it's over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「井ノ原、まだ終わってないぞ。そこ、座れー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Inohara, it's not over yet. Have a seat over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Inohara, it's not over yet. Have a seat over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昼ご飯争奪戦に乗り出そうとした僕たちの気をそぐ教科担任。
MESSAGE.EN: Our homeroom teacher sliced right through our excitement as we prepared to join in the battle that is school lunchtime.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our homeroom teacher sliced right through our excitement as we prepared to join in the battle that is school lunchtime.

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「実は午後から臨時理事会議が行われることになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝The truth is, there's a meeting of the Board of Directors in the afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝The truth is, there's a meeting of the Board of Directors in the afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「教職員も手伝いに出なくてはいけないので、午後は休講とする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝They want the teachers to participate as well, so there will be no lecture this afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝They want the teachers to participate as well, so there will be no lecture this afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「とはいえ校外に出るのは禁止だ。羽目外すなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝That said, you can't leave the school. No playing hooky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝That said, you can't leave the school. No playing hooky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教師はそれだけ言って出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: With that the teacher left.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that the teacher left.

MESSAGE.JP: ざわめく教室。
MESSAGE.EN: The classroom erupted into chaos.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classroom erupted into chaos.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いきなり自由時間ができちまったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It became self-study all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It became self-study all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いい加減なものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How irresponsible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How irresponsible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「私立だからそんなものかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it's like this at private schools.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it's like this at private schools.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にしたって、そんな大事な会議なのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: That said, I wonder just how important this board meeting could be.
MESSAGE.Translation: That said, I wonder just how important this board meeting could be.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大きな事件が起こったとかかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if something big happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if something big happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…どうだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Couldn't say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Couldn't say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんな事件があったなんて聞いたこともねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I haven't heard about anything big happening around here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I haven't heard about anything big happening around here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それより、飯食いに行こうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝More importantly, let's go eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝More importantly, let's go eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだな。飯を食べながら、何か有意義に過ごすことを考えるとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Indeed. And while we eat we can think of some good way to spend our time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Indeed. And while we eat we can think of some good way to spend our time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだな。飯を食べながら、午後から何して遊ぶか決めるとする、か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes. While we eat we can decide what to play this afternoon, I suppose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes. While we eat we can decide what to play this afternoon, I suppose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、そうしよう。遊ぶ案はともかく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's do that. Except the playing bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's do that. Except the playing bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は真人や謙吾と一緒に学食へ行くことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I went with Kengo and Masato to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went with Kengo and Masato to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 食べ終わったころ、寮長に声を掛けられた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was just getting done eating, the dorm head called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was just getting done eating, the dorm head called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「直枝くん、それに井ノ原くんと宮沢くんも。ちょっと手伝ってくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Naoe-kun, oh and Inohara-kun and Miyazawa-kun also. Could I get you boys to help me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Naoe-kun, oh and Inohara-kun and Miyazawa-kun also. Could I get you boys to help me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介のミッションもある手前、僕らはそれを断れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it was part of Kyousuke's mission, we couldn't refuse.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it was part of Kyousuke's mission, we couldn't refuse.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「集まったみたいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Looks like we're all here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Looks like we're all here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長が部屋に集まった一同に声を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head spoke to all of us gathered in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head spoke to all of us gathered in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「唐突にできた半日休講」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Suddenly, the latter half of our school day has been cancelled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Suddenly, the latter half of our school day has been cancelled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「たまった仕事を片付けます。皆さん、ご協力よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝So we'd like to get through some of our work that's been piling up. Thank you in advance for your help, everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝So we'd like to get through some of our work that's been piling up. Thank you in advance for your help, everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に集まった生徒たちは、寮長の指示を貰っては部屋を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: The students left the room after receiving their instructions from the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: The students left the room after receiving their instructions from the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子寮長@「そちらのがたいのいいお二人はこちらに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Dorm Head@❝You two over there with the great builds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Dorm Head@❝You two over there with the great builds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「部室のためとはいえ、ちょいと面倒だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even though it's for our clubroom, this is kind of a pain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even though it's for our clubroom, this is kind of a pain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何、これも鍛錬だ。筋肉を鍛えると思え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Come now, this is just a form of training. Just think of the muscles you're building.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Come now, this is just a form of training. Just think of the muscles you're building.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なるほどな。ちょっと楽しくなってくるじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're right. I think this just got a little more fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're right. I think this just got a little more fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「手伝わなくてはならないのか？　それじゃ遊べなくなるじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Do we have to help? But then we can't have any fun together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Do we have to help? But then we can't have any fun together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しりとりぐらいなら、手伝いながらでもできるんじゃねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I guess we could at least play some shiritori while we work?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I guess we could at least play some shiritori while we work?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえ、天才だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're a genius!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're a genius!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「さぁ、いくぞっ、しりとりの、り………り……り……り…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, let's start, shiritori's RI... ri... ri... ri...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, let's start, shiritori's RI... ri... ri... ri...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…もう終わりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...is it game over already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...is it game over already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「否！　否、否、否ぁ！　しばし待て！　り……り……り…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No! No no never! Just wait a moment! Ri... ri... ri...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No! No no never! Just wait a moment! Ri... ri... ri...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人と謙吾は男子寮長に連れられてどこかへ行ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo were led off somewhere by the male dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo were led off somewhere by the male dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は何をすればいいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでに寮長ふたりの机には書類の山ができつつある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a mountain of documents piled up on the dorm heads' desks.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a mountain of documents piled up on the dorm heads' desks.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だけ残されたのは何か理由があるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if there was a reason only I had been left there alone...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if there was a reason only I had been left there alone...

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「直枝くんと二木さんは寮の清掃をお願いするわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Naoe-kun and Futaki-san, please take care of cleaning the dorms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Naoe-kun and Futaki-san, please take care of cleaning the dorms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「詳しいことは、二木さんに言っておいたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Futaki-san will fill you in on the specifics.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Futaki-san will fill you in on the specifics.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二木さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「こらこら、嫌そうな顔をしないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Come now, don't make such a sour face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Come now, don't make such a sour face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごく不満そうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked extremely displeased...
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked extremely displeased...

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「掃除するときは男の子がいたほうが役に立つわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's better to have a boy around for cleaning, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's better to have a boy around for cleaning, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…使い倒していいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...May I work him to the bone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...May I work him to the bone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「どうぞどうぞ。棗くん公認だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Yes, feel free. We have Natsume-kun's permission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Yes, feel free. We have Natsume-kun's permission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、お手柔らかにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝G, go easy on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝G, go easy on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんと一緒に寮長室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the dorm heads' room with Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the dorm heads' room with Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …怖い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was scared.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was scared.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、どうしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what do we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what do we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クリップボードに挟まれた紙の束をめくっている二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was flipping through a bundle of papers on a clipboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was flipping through a bundle of papers on a clipboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いくつか候補があるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...We have many tasks to choose from.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...We have many tasks to choose from.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「連絡掲示板の修理、花壇の中のごみ拾い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Repair the bulletin boards, collect trash from the gardens...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Repair the bulletin boards, collect trash from the gardens...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「寮の窓ガラス拭きに、洗濯室の掃除」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Washing the dormitory windows, cleaning the laundry rooms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Washing the dormitory windows, cleaning the laundry rooms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふたりで全部やるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just the two of us are gonna do all that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just the two of us are gonna do all that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やりたいならひとりで全部やってもらってもいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You could do it all alone if you'd like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You could do it all alone if you'd like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うっ…それはちょっと無理じゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uuu... I'm pretty sure that's impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uuu... I'm pretty sure that's impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どれかひとつをやって、残りは他のひとに割り振るわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...We'll see how far we can go, whatever's left will be assigned to someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...We'll see how far we can go, whatever's left will be assigned to someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大変な仕事もあるから、誰か暇そうなひと呼んでもいいわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Some of the work will be difficult, so if you know anyone who has time feel free to call them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Some of the work will be difficult, so if you know anyone who has time feel free to call them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふたりでできることをやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's just do it together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's just do it together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごく警戒されているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked extremely wary.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked extremely wary.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、他のひとがいたら二木さんがやりづらいんじゃないかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, I was just thinking it'd be harder for you if I called someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, I was just thinking it'd be harder for you if I called someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そんなに人付き合い苦手そうに見える？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Do I really look like I'm that bad at dealing with people?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Do I really look like I'm that bad at dealing with people?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや、そういう意味で言ったんじゃないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, no, that's not what I meant, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, no, that's not what I meant, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも得意そうには見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I'd say social interaction definitely wasn't her strong point.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I'd say social interaction definitely wasn't her strong point.

MESSAGE.JP: ため息をついて、肩の力を抜く二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san let out a sigh and let her shoulders slump.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san let out a sigh and let her shoulders slump.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...True.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...True.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「賑やかなのは、あんまり…慣れてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't have too much experience with... lively situations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't have too much experience with... lively situations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「騒ぎを見ているのは、好きなんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But I do like seeing a little commotion now and then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But I do like seeing a little commotion now and then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し意外な言葉を聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was a little surprised by those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was a little surprised by those words.

MESSAGE.JP: てっきり賑やかなことや騒がしいことが嫌いだ、と言うと思ったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I was thinking she would say she hated anything chaotic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was thinking she would say she hated anything chaotic.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「その最たるものがあなたたちだったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And I'd say the ones best at that kind of thing are you and your friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And I'd say the ones best at that kind of thing are you and your friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「野球はじめたり、チャンバラはじめたり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Playing baseball, starting sword fights.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Playing baseball, starting sword fights.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「肝試しだの缶蹴りだの…小さな子供のように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Doing a test of courage, playing kick the can... just like children.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Doing a test of courage, playing kick the can... just like children.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「馬鹿みたいに、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Like a bunch of fools.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Like a bunch of fools.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「色々謝りたい気がするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I feel like there's a lot I need to apologize for...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I feel like there's a lot I need to apologize for...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いいんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Isn't it alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Isn't it alright?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「学校だって楽しいことばかりじゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝School isn't just about having fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝School isn't just about having fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「辛いことや苦しいこともたくさんある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are plenty of painful and bitter things here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are plenty of painful and bitter things here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「傷つくことだってたくさんあるし…それでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And many things that will hurt you... but.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And many things that will hurt you... but.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それでも、その中で楽しいことを見つけていくのは前向きなことだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, being able to find the fun among all those things makes you a positive person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, being able to find the fun among all those things makes you a positive person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ここを出たら、どうせ荒波に揉まれることになるのだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though, after you leave here, you'll be tossed about by stormy seas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though, after you leave here, you'll be tossed about by stormy seas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…荒波、って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Stormy seas?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Stormy seas?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ここにいる間は、被保護者として扱われるわけでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝While you're here, you're treated as proteges.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝While you're here, you're treated as proteges.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 学生でいるっていうのはそういうことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess that's what it means to be a student.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess that's what it means to be a student.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「でも、いつまでもここにはいられないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But, you're not always going to be here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But, you're not always going to be here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いつか出て行かなくちゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Someday you'll have to leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Someday you'll have to leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…例えば受験や就職とか考えなくちゃいけないみたいなもので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...For instance, there will come a time when you'll have to think of nothing but entrance exams or finding work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...For instance, there will come a time when you'll have to think of nothing but entrance exams or finding work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介のことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought of Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought of Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が進学しない理由…多分それは鈴のためなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason Kyousuke wasn't going to college... that was probably for Rin's sake.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason Kyousuke wasn't going to college... that was probably for Rin's sake.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとずっと先を、恭介はもう見つめているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was already looking so far, far ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was already looking so far, far ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と、違って。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…でも、まだ時間はあるんだから。あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...But, there's still time, after all. For you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...But, there's still time, after all. For you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「遊んでいていいんじゃない？　許されるうちはね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Isn't it alright to enjoy yourselves while you still can?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Isn't it alright to enjoy yourselves while you still can?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 清掃リストだろうか、クリップボードの紙に書き込みをしていた顔をあげる二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san, who had been looking down and writing on what I assumed was the cleaning list on the clipboard, looked up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san, who had been looking down and writing on what I assumed was the cleaning list on the clipboard, looked up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今がずっと続けばいいのに、と時々思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I would sometimes think it'd be great if these days just continued forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would sometimes think it'd be great if these days just continued forever.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそれは猶予期間でしかないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But this was just a grace period.
MESSAGE.Translation: But this was just a grace period.

MESSAGE.JP: さみしいことだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Depressing as it was to admit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Depressing as it was to admit.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…さて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Now then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Now then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん、と二木さんはクリップボードを片手で叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san tapped the clipboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san tapped the clipboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はじめましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Shall we begin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Shall we begin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。そうだね。何をするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I guess. What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I guess. What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「掲示板の補修をしにいきましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Let's do some maintenance on the bulletin boards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Let's do some maintenance on the bulletin boards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下のあちこちにある掲示板。
MESSAGE.EN: There were bulletin boards here and there along the hallways.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were bulletin boards here and there along the hallways.

MESSAGE.JP: 部活や委員会のポスターを貼ったりする。
MESSAGE.EN: They had posters for different clubs and groups pinned to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had posters for different clubs and groups pinned to them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「改めてみると、結構壊れているのも多いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that I'm really looking at them, quite a few are pretty busted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that I'm really looking at them, quite a few are pretty busted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木枠が外れていたり、古い紙で埋まっていて使えないのもある。
MESSAGE.EN: Some of the wooden frames were falling apart, and some were covered in so many old posters they were entirely unusable.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some of the wooden frames were falling apart, and some were covered in so many old posters they were entirely unusable.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 抱えていた新しいボードを下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently lowered the new board I was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently lowered the new board I was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもホワイトボード化しちゃったら、ポスターとか貼りづらくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But since we're changing to whiteboards, how are people going to pin on posters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But since we're changing to whiteboards, how are people going to pin on posters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「マグネットがあるからそれを使うのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are magnets available, people will use those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are magnets available, people will use those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにマグネットなら、画鋲取りとかしなくていいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's true, with magnets we won't have to deal with all the pushpins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's true, with magnets we won't have to deal with all the pushpins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ささいな連絡事項なら、ボードマーカーを使って書けばいいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And if it's just a regular message, they can write it up using whiteboard markers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And if it's just a regular message, they can write it up using whiteboard markers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「紙の節約にもなるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So we won't waste as much paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So we won't waste as much paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うーん、エコロジー。
MESSAGE.EN: Yep, that's ecological.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yep, that's ecological.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「徐々にホワイトボード化してるんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We're slowly switching more and more bulletin boards out for whiteboards.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We're slowly switching more and more bulletin boards out for whiteboards.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ゆくゆくは全部ホワイトボードになるんじゃないのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm guessing we'll eventually replace them all, one by one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm guessing we'll eventually replace them all, one by one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「執行部はそのつもりみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's the executives' intention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's the executives' intention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…木枠のコルク掲示板も趣はあると思うけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Though I think cork bulletin boards have their uses too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Though I think cork bulletin boards have their uses too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「要望が出された掲示板は古いまま、残してあるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There's been a petition to leave the old boards as they are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There's been a petition to leave the old boards as they are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「要望？　そんなひといるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A petition? I didn't realize there were people who'd care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A petition? I didn't realize there were people who'd care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「世の中には物好きも多いみたいね。別にいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are people in this world interested in all kinds of things. I don't really mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are people in this world interested in all kinds of things. I don't really mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そっち持って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Grab that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Grab that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ボードにアルミ枠を取り付けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I held the aluminum frame to the board.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held the aluminum frame to the board.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは片足をついてしゃがみこむと、ネジとドライバーを確認している。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san went down on one knee and brought out a screwdriver and some screws.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san went down on one knee and brought out a screwdriver and some screws.

MESSAGE.JP: ボードを押えている僕は、二木さんの後ろ頭を見下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: As I supported the board for her, the back of Futaki-san's head was before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I supported the board for her, the back of Futaki-san's head was before me.

MESSAGE.JP: ふらふらと桜色をした髪留めが揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her cherry pink hair ornament swayed back and forth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her cherry pink hair ornament swayed back and forth.

MESSAGE.JP: 前から思ってたけど、この髪留めって少しこどもっぽいデザインだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had always thought that accessory had a somewhat childish design.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had always thought that accessory had a somewhat childish design.

MESSAGE.JP: 近くで見ると昔から使っていたのか、細かい傷もついて色がくすんでいるのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at it close-up, I realized that she must have been using it for a long time as the color was dulled by countless small scratches.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at it close-up, I realized that she must have been using it for a long time as the color was dulled by countless small scratches.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（んー……）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hnn......)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hnn......)

MESSAGE.JP: 腰まである二木さんの髪の毛。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's hair hung all the way down her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's hair hung all the way down her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 毛先が床まで届きそうな感じ。
MESSAGE.EN: It almost looked like the tips of her hair could reach the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: It almost looked like the tips of her hair could reach the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 髪の毛が長い子は、お風呂とか大変そうだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if it was tough for girls with long hair to take baths.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if it was tough for girls with long hair to take baths.

MESSAGE.JP: 転んだりしたときにほこりとかいっぱいつきそうだし。
MESSAGE.EN: For instance if you happen to fall to the ground it must get full of dust and stuff.
MESSAGE.Translation: For instance if you happen to fall to the ground it must get full of dust and stuff.

MESSAGE.JP: あと、シャンプー大量に要るだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Plus, it must require tons of shampoo...
MESSAGE.Translation: Plus, it must require tons of shampoo...

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ちょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の髪の毛もそうだけど。普段どうしているんだろ？
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's hair was like that too. What did she normally do?
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's hair was like that too. What did she normally do?

MESSAGE.JP: お風呂に毎日入れなかったら、辛いだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess if they didn't bathe every day it'd be a mess.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess if they didn't bathe every day it'd be a mess.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ねぇ、ちょっと！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Hey, listen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Hey, listen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, huh? What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, huh? What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何じゃないわよ。ぼーっとしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't give me that. Don't just space out like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't give me that. Don't just space out like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん。なんだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry. What did you need?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry. What did you need?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を見上げた二木さんは怪訝そうな顔をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was looking up at me with suspicion plain on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was looking up at me with suspicion plain on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Well, never mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Well, never mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドライバーを手渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed over a screwdriver.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed over a screwdriver.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「木枠の掲示板を外して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Take down the wooden board.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Take down the wooden board.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかった。でも上のほう届くかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it. But, I can't reach the top...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it. But, I can't reach the top...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「椅子持ってくるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll grab you a chair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll grab you a chair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室の中に二木さんは入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san went into the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san went into the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず下から外そう。
MESSAGE.EN: For now I'll start from the bottom.
MESSAGE.Translation: For now I'll start from the bottom.

MESSAGE.JP: ネジをふたつ外したところで二木さんが戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san returned as I finished pulling out two of the screws.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san returned as I finished pulling out two of the screws.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 椅子にのぼり、木枠の上にあるネジにドライバーを当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got up on the chair and began to work on the screws on the top of the board.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got up on the chair and began to work on the screws on the top of the board.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと固いな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're kinda tough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're kinda tough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐっと力を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I flexed my arm and put some force into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flexed my arm and put some force into it.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは下の木枠を押えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was holding the bottom of the board.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was holding the bottom of the board.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会とか委員会とか、地味だよね、こういう活動」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm council, and the executive committee, they get pretty boring jobs sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm council, and the executive committee, they get pretty boring jobs sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝True.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝True.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言われるまで、ホワイトボードが増えているなんて気がつかなかったし。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't even noticed the whiteboards were increasing on campus until she told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't even noticed the whiteboards were increasing on campus until she told me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大変だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It sure isn't easy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It sure isn't easy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「大変、って何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What isn't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What isn't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「思い出したけど、芝生の水やりとかさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just remembered that you folks take care of watering the grounds too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just remembered that you folks take care of watering the grounds too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「色々だよ。風紀委員会とかさ、葉留佳さんおっかけてるばかりのイメージがあったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really do a lot around the school. I always thought the prefects spent their time just chasing Haruka-san around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really do a lot around the school. I always thought the prefects spent their time just chasing Haruka-san around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「他の仕事も当然あるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it's natural you'd have other work to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it's natural you'd have other work to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっき寮長に指示を聞いていたときに、見た覚えのある生徒たち。
MESSAGE.EN: I had recognized some of the students the dorm head was ordering around earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had recognized some of the students the dorm head was ordering around earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員っぽかった気がする。腕章はしてなかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed to be prefects. They weren't wearing their armbands, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed to be prefects. They weren't wearing their armbands, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 万年人手不足らしい寮会の手伝いを色々な委員たちがしているのは考えてみれば意外でもなんでもない。
MESSAGE.EN: When I considered that all kinds of clubs were helping out the always shorthanded dorm council, it really wasn't that strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I considered that all kinds of clubs were helping out the always shorthanded dorm council, it really wasn't that strange.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「知ってみると、なんか全く違うなぁ、というか、そんな気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The more I come to know about them, the more I feel they're not like that at all, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The more I come to know about them, the more I feel they're not like that at all, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…知らないっていうのはそういうことじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Isn't that what it means to not know about something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Isn't that what it means to not know about something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何も知らないひとは色々言うけど、その実、すごい見返りがあるわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝People who don't know anything can say whatever they want, and it costs them nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝People who don't know anything can say whatever they want, and it costs them nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「知らない、ってことは幸いなこと。知らなくて済むのなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're actually better off not knowing. If you can get away with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're actually better off not knowing. If you can get away with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それができるのなら、そのままでいたほうがいいのよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you are, then I think it's definitely better to stay that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you are, then I think it's definitely better to stay that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今を、何も知らないまま…楽しく過ごせたら、きっと幸せなことでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Knowing nothing... just spending your time enjoying yourself, I'm sure that is a happier way to live.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Knowing nothing... just spending your time enjoying yourself, I'm sure that is a happier way to live.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「他人の労苦というものは大抵見えないものだから、部外者はいつだって手厳くなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝The efforts of other people often go unseen, so people looking at us from the outside tend to judge us harshly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝The efforts of other people often go unseen, so people looking at us from the outside tend to judge us harshly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「見えないものは存在しないも同じだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Things that go unseen may as well not exist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Things that go unseen may as well not exist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「存在しないものをどれだけ踏みにじっても心が痛まない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You can trample on someone's feelings out of ignorance. It won't sting your conscience.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You can trample on someone's feelings out of ignorance. It won't sting your conscience.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「外にいるひとたちは、知らないから好き勝手言えるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you're an outsider and know nothing, you can say whatever you will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you're an outsider and know nothing, you can say whatever you will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「もしも外から中へ入って、知ってしまえば、ただ黙っているしかないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But if you stop being an outsider and learn the truth, you have no choice but to keep your mouth shut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But if you stop being an outsider and learn the truth, you have no choice but to keep your mouth shut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「くやしいけど。とても、とてもくやしいけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No matter how frustrating it is. No matter how much it aches.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No matter how frustrating it is. No matter how much it aches.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…けど『好きでやってるんでしょ』と言われればそれまでだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...But, since people can say ❛you're doing it because you want to❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...But, since people can say ❛you're doing it because you want to❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「黙っているしかない。自分で選んだことだもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We have no choice but to stay silent. Because we chose this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We have no choice but to stay silent. Because we chose this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そのくやしさも、黙って耐えるだけだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And we have to bear that frustration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And we have to bear that frustration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 視線を下に向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I lowered my gaze.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lowered my gaze.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはまっすぐ見返してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked straight back into my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked straight back into my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは、好きでやってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, are you doing it because you like it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, are you doing it because you like it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…半分は好きでやってる。もう半分は役割だからやってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Half because I like it. The other half because it's my duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Half because I like it. The other half because it's my duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「役割がなかったら自発的にはやらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it wasn't your duty, would you not volunteer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it wasn't your duty, would you not volunteer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「やっていたでしょうね。性分だもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'd do it. It's in my nature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'd do it. It's in my nature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話をしている間に、固いネジがようやく２本外れた。
MESSAGE.EN: While she had been talking I had managed to work loose the two tough screws.
MESSAGE.Translation: While she had been talking I had managed to work loose the two tough screws.

MESSAGE.JP: 上のはしを持って、椅子を降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the frame by the top and stepped off the chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the frame by the top and stepped off the chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これを取り付けるんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need to stick this up, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need to stick this up, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木枠を床に置いてから、ホワイトボードを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: After setting the wooden frame on the ground, I pointed to the whiteboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: After setting the wooden frame on the ground, I pointed to the whiteboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ボードの取り付けは私がやるからいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't worry, I'll handle the whiteboard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't worry, I'll handle the whiteboard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ボードの下、持ってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You just hold it from below.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You just hold it from below.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは椅子にあがると手早くホワイトボードを壁にネジ止めした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san got up on the chair and deftly fastened the whiteboard to the wall with screws.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san got up on the chair and deftly fastened the whiteboard to the wall with screws.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「手慣れてるね、二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're good at that, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're good at that, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「別に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Not really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Not really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何度も何度も…何回も何回も繰り返しやって慣れちゃっただけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...After doing it over and over... over and over and over, I got used to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...After doing it over and over... over and over and over, I got used to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「こんなことしても無駄なんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though doing these things is pointless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though doing these things is pointless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それでも、求められるから、やってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Still, they want me to do it, so I do it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Still, they want me to do it, so I do it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに。掲示板はいっぱいあるから、替えていく作業をすれば慣れてしまうのだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: True. There were tons of bulletin boards, so after changing so many of them I'm sure she had had plenty of practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: True. There were tons of bulletin boards, so after changing so many of them I'm sure she had had plenty of practice.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「次、行きましょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Let's move on to the next...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Let's move on to the next...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝......tch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝......tch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドライバーを僕に渡すとき、指が触れる。
MESSAGE.EN: When she went to hand me the screwdriver our fingers touched.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she went to hand me the screwdriver our fingers touched.

MESSAGE.JP: その瞬間、二木さんが体を、びくっ、とすくませた。
MESSAGE.EN: In that instant, Futaki-san's body gave a small jolt.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that instant, Futaki-san's body gave a small jolt.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとあからさまな動きに、悪いことをしているような気分になってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was such a clear reaction that I couldn't help but feel like I'd done something wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was such a clear reaction that I couldn't help but feel like I'd done something wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（でも、なんか表情が強ばりすぎてたような…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But, even with that her expression is way too stiff...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But, even with that her expression is way too stiff...)

MESSAGE.JP: こっちに顔を見せずに、椅子からぎこちなく降りる二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Making sure not to look my way, Futaki-san clumsily descended from the chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making sure not to look my way, Futaki-san clumsily descended from the chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…古い掲示板は、そこに置いたままでいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...You can just leave the old board there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...You can just leave the old board there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あとで回収させるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We'll retrieve it later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We'll retrieve it later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き出す二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san took off walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san took off walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。次はどこ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, right. Where's the next one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, right. Where's the next one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「２階の階段のところね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝By the stairs on the second floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝By the stairs on the second floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっと様子をうかがってみると、普段どおりの無表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I quietly stole a glance at her, but she was expressionless as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quietly stole a glance at her, but she was expressionless as always.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とクドを呼んでみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should ask Rin and Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should ask Rin and Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりにメールを送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent a mail to the two of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent a mail to the two of them.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…決まった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Have you decided?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Have you decided?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。鈴とクドを呼ぶよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'm calling Kud and Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'm calling Kud and Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『任務了解』
MESSAGE.EN: [Mission Accepted].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Mission Accepted].

MESSAGE.JP: 『らじゃーなのです』
MESSAGE.EN: [Rajya].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Rajya].

MESSAGE.JP: 同じような返信がきた。
MESSAGE.EN: They both send similar replies.
MESSAGE.Translation: They both send similar replies.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「オッケーだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They said okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They said okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…その人選だと花壇のごみ拾いが良さそうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...If you chose those two, cleaning the trash from the gardens would probably be best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...If you chose those two, cleaning the trash from the gardens would probably be best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「花壇へ行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Let's head for the flowerbeds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Let's head for the flowerbeds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ待ち合わせ場所は中庭で、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then I'll tell them to meet us in the courtyard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then I'll tell them to meet us in the courtyard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「送ったよ、二木さん…って、もう歩き出してるしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, I sent the mail, Futaki-san... hey, she's already taken off by herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, I sent the mail, Futaki-san... hey, she's already taken off by herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて二木さんの後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly chased after Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly chased after Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はろー、リキ、佳奈多さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki, Kanata-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki, Kanata-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「呼び出してごめんね、鈴、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry to call you out like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry to call you out like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とクドの周りには、案の定というか猫たちと犬がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected, there were cats and dogs surrounding the two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected, there were cats and dogs surrounding the two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: オンオン。
MESSAGE.EN: Yap yap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yap yap.

MESSAGE.JP: ヴァウー
MESSAGE.EN: Bowwow-
MESSAGE.Translation: Bowwow-

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ストレルカにヴェルカもお疲れさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for your help too, Strelka and Belka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for your help too, Strelka and Belka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 風紀委員会の仕事はいいのかな？
MESSAGE.EN: Was it alright to take them away from their work for the disciplinary committee?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it alright to take them away from their work for the disciplinary committee?

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが何も言わないということは、委員会の仕事はないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Futaki-san wasn't saying anything, I supposed they didn't have any prefect work to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Futaki-san wasn't saying anything, I supposed they didn't have any prefect work to do.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「何の用事だ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと手伝ってほしいことがあってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wanted you to help with some stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wanted you to help with some stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、ひょっとして忙しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, could it be you're busy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, could it be you're busy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーみゅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝U-myu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝U-myu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いそがしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm busy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm busy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ドルジと遊んでいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was playing with Dorj.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was playing with Dorj.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬおっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは忙しいとは言わないよ、鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wouldn't call that ❛busy,❜ Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wouldn't call that ❛busy,❜ Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nukyu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nukyu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドルジは手を叩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Dorj was beating his paws together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dorj was beating his paws together.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はらーきゅー、きゅーじゅーきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Bi-g rou-nd belly, pou-nds of rou-nd...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Bi-g rou-nd belly, pou-nds of rou-nd...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ドルジのはらきゅー、きゅーじゅー・とぅーぐるぐー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Dorj's big round be-lly, roll it on the gro-und...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Dorj's big round be-lly, roll it on the gro-und...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは変な歌をうたいながら、ドルジの腹を突いて遊んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was playing with Dorj, prodding his stomach and singing a strange song.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was playing with Dorj, prodding his stomach and singing a strange song.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「はらーきゅーきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Big rou-nd rou-nd...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Big rou-nd rou-nd...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴も歌って遊んでいる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin started singing and doing it too...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin started singing and doing it too...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、二木さんそんな目で僕をにらまないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Futaki-san, please don't look at me like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Futaki-san, please don't look at me like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふたりとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱんぱん。手を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Whup whup. Dorj hit his paws together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whup whup. Dorj hit his paws together.

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬお」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ドルジも聞いて。花壇のごみ拾いを手伝ってほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You listen too, Dorj. I want your help cleaning the trash from the flowerbeds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You listen too, Dorj. I want your help cleaning the trash from the flowerbeds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「寮周辺の美化清掃、でしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So it's like a campus cleanup?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So it's like a campus cleanup?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, just like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, just like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふ、わかりました。ヴェルカ、ストレルカー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu, understood. Belka, Strelka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu, understood. Belka, Strelka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヴルルル。
MESSAGE.EN: Urrrrr.
MESSAGE.Translation: Urrrrr.

MESSAGE.JP: ヴァウ。
MESSAGE.EN: Bow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bow.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「がんばりまーす、だそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They said they'll do their best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They said they'll do their best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ２匹がいるのは心強いな。
MESSAGE.EN: It was heartening to have the two of them there for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was heartening to have the two of them there for us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴もいいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You okay too, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You okay too, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしも問題ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't have a problem either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't have a problem either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえたち。ごみ拾い開始だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's clean up the trash, you guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's clean up the trash, you guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー。ごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nyaa. Roll roll.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nyaa. Roll roll.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やるきゼロだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Looks like they've got zero interest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Looks like they've got zero interest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ゼロだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, zero...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, zero...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、ドルジはやるきがあるみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, it looks like Dorj wants to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, it looks like Dorj wants to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ほんとに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬおぬおぬおっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo nuo nuo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo nuo nuo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おおっ。おまえやるきあるのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ohh. So you wanna do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ohh. So you wanna do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬぉー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Roll roll roll.
MESSAGE.Translation: Roll roll roll.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「転がっていっちゃいましたね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝He started rolling away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝He started rolling away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やるきあるのかないのかわからんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't tell if he wants to help or not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't tell if he wants to help or not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「微妙なところだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It is somewhat unclear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It is somewhat unclear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Roll roll roll.
MESSAGE.Translation: Roll roll roll.

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nukyu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nukyu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「戻ってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So you came back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So you came back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「単に鈴に構って欲しいだけのようにも見えるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It sort of looks like he just wants Rin to pay more attention to him, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It sort of looks like he just wants Rin to pay more attention to him, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは額に手を突いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was tapping her forehead with a frown.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was tapping her forehead with a frown.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、一応やるきはあるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahh, well it supposedly looks like he wants to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahh, well it supposedly looks like he wants to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「フォローしなくてもいいわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Please don't feel the need to cover for him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Please don't feel the need to cover for him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はじめましょうか、クドリャフカ、棗さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Shall we get started, Kudryavka, Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Shall we get started, Kudryavka, Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ラジャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rajya-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rajya-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりにごみ袋を渡して、二木さんは花壇の中に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san handed the two of them trash bags, then headed in among the flowerbeds.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san handed the two of them trash bags, then headed in among the flowerbeds.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに、鈴？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 花壇の中にはペットボトルとかが落ちている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were plastic bottles and such discarded among the flowerbeds.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were plastic bottles and such discarded among the flowerbeds.

MESSAGE.JP: それを拾っていると、鈴に袖を引かれた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was gathering those up, Rin tugged on my sleeve.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was gathering those up, Rin tugged on my sleeve.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きょーすけのミッションか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is this Kyousuke's mission?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is this Kyousuke's mission?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね。…そういえば鈴も何か恭介から頼まれてたんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pretty much. ...Actually, hasn't Kyousuke asked you to do anything, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pretty much. ...Actually, hasn't Kyousuke asked you to do anything, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ささ子のとりまきと部室棟の掃除をしている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've been cleaning rooms with Sasako's groupies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've been cleaning rooms with Sasako's groupies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ちょこっとずつだから、なかなか終わらない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But we only do a little at a time, so it seems like we'll never get done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But we only do a little at a time, so it seems like we'll never get done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「掃除は毎日やることが大事だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why it's important to clean every day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why it's important to clean every day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うー、めんどい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uuu-, it's such a pain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uuu-, it's such a pain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーにゃー。猫たちが空き缶で遊んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nyaa nyaa. The cats were playing with an empty can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nyaa nyaa. The cats were playing with an empty can.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こらぁっ。ごみの空き缶に鼻をつっこんじゃ、めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey! Sticking your nose into empty cans is a no-no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey! Sticking your nose into empty cans is a no-no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nyaa...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nyaa...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「でも、こいつらのためにも拾っておいたほうがよさそうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, it's best for these guys if we clean this all up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, it's best for these guys if we clean this all up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わぁっ、ヴェルカ、落ちてるものに興味示しちゃだめですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Waa, Belka, don't go sniffing around at the trash.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Waa, Belka, don't go sniffing around at the trash.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ヴェルカたちのためにも、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...and for Belka and Strelka's sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...and for Belka and Strelka's sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は付け足して頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin added that with a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin added that with a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、がんばって、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, do your best, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, do your best, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず作業を開始。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus our mission began.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus our mission began.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが犬たちに見つけるよう指示をして、鈴と僕が拾う。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud told her dogs to look for trash, and Rin and I would pick it up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud told her dogs to look for trash, and Rin and I would pick it up.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんが分別して、ドルジがごみ袋を引っ張って転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san separated the trash by type, and Dorj pulled on the trash bag and rolled around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san separated the trash by type, and Dorj pulled on the trash bag and rolled around.

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬぉ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろごろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Roll roll roll.
MESSAGE.Translation: Roll roll roll.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつ絶対遊んでるだけだぞ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's definitely just playing around!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's definitely just playing around!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も羨ましそうに言わないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you shouldn't sound so jealous saying that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you shouldn't sound so jealous saying that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑しながら空き缶を拾った。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave a wry smile as I picked up an empty can.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave a wry smile as I picked up an empty can.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Toryaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Toryaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が最後のごみ袋をごみ置き場に投げ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin tossed the final sack of garbage into the disposal area.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin tossed the final sack of garbage into the disposal area.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「おつかれさま、棗さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Good work, Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Good work, Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さん、おつかれさまなのですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごみ置き場の周りに生徒たちが来てはごみ袋を積んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: There were students all around the garbage area bringing sacks and piling them up.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were students all around the garbage area bringing sacks and piling them up.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ドルジ、ストレルカ、ヴェルカ、よくやった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Dorj, Strelka, Belka, good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Dorj, Strelka, Belka, good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ほめてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You have my thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You have my thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はドルジを撫でている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was stroking Dorj.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was stroking Dorj.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはそんな鈴を興味深そうに見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was gazing at Rin with deep interest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was gazing at Rin with deep interest.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さんは猫、好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, do you like cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, do you like cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どうかしら。好きでも嫌いでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I wonder. I don't like them or hate them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I wonder. I don't like them or hate them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私が寄っていくと猫たちは逃げていくから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Because whenever I approach a cat, it runs away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Because whenever I approach a cat, it runs away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「猫のほうが私のことを嫌いなのかもしれないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It seems that it is the cats that don't like me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It seems that it is the cats that don't like me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふ、私も近づいていくとよく逃げられます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu, they run away when I get near them too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu, they run away when I get near them too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドの場合は意味合いが違うような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's different in your case, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's different in your case, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬおぬおっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo nuo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo nuo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ドルジはなついているな。おこさま好きだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Dorj took a liking to you, though. Since he likes children.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Dorj took a liking to you, though. Since he likes children.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おこさまですか私!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm a child!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm a child!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「猫は家につく、犬はひとにつく、って言うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝They say a cat attaches itself to a house, and a dog attaches itself to a person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝They say a cat attaches itself to a house, and a dog attaches itself to a person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたたちはどうなのかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And what about you two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And what about you two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とクドを見ながら言う二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san said this while looking at Kud and Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san said this while looking at Kud and Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真顔で訊く二木さんに、鈴とクドは首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and Kud tilted their heads in confusion while looking at Futaki-san, who had asked the question seriously.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and Kud tilted their heads in confusion while looking at Futaki-san, who had asked the question seriously.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 微かに二木さんの頬が緩んでいるように見えたのは気のせいだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was it just me, or did Futaki-san's expression loosen up just a little?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it just me, or did Futaki-san's expression loosen up just a little?

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「棗さん、クドリャフカ、協力ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Natsume-san, Kudryavka, thank you for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Natsume-san, Kudryavka, thank you for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今日はこれでおしまい。寮長室で協力してくれたひとにチケット配ってるらしいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝That's all for today. It seems the dormitory committee is handing out tickets to everyone who helped out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝That's all for today. It seems the dormitory committee is handing out tickets to everyone who helped out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「行ってくるといいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You should go get yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You should go get yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「チケットですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Tickets?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Tickets?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「学食券とかみたいよ。あとは…なんだったか忘れたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are coupons for the cafeteria. Also... I forgot what else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are coupons for the cafeteria. Also... I forgot what else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ほんとですかー。では行ってきますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? Then I'll go see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? Then I'll go see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「行きましょう鈴さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go, Rin-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go, Rin-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わ、クド、ひっぱるなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wa, Kud, don't pull!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wa, Kud, don't pull!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とクドにつられて犬や猫たちもあっという間に姿を消す。
MESSAGE.EN: The dogs and cats brought by Kud and Rin also vanished soon after.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dogs and cats brought by Kud and Rin also vanished soon after.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やれやれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good grief...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good grief...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは、というとごみ袋の山に緑色のネットを掛けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was covering the mountain of trash bags with a green netting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was covering the mountain of trash bags with a green netting.

MESSAGE.JP: カラス対策のネットだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it was to keep the crows away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it was to keep the crows away.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おつかれさま」
