MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そこで『まだいたの』って顔されても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't give me that ❛You're-still-here?❜ look...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't give me that ❛You're-still-here?❜ look...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「まだいたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're still here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're still here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いたよ。もう手伝うことはない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I am. Is there anything else I can help with?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I am. Is there anything else I can help with?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝No, there isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝No, there isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。じゃ、寮長室へ戻ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright. Then let's head back to the dorm council room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright. Then let's head back to the dorm council room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 提案すると、二木さんは眉根を寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san furrowed her brows at my invitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san furrowed her brows at my invitation.

MESSAGE.JP: 素っ気ない言葉を僕があっさり受け流したことに気がついたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm guessing she was bothered by how easily I had let her blunt words slide.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm guessing she was bothered by how easily I had let her blunt words slide.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「戻らないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you not going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you not going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…もちろん、戻ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Of course I'm going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Of course I'm going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんと一緒に寮長室へ戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed back to the dorm council room with Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed back to the dorm council room with Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんと西園さんを呼ぼう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll call Komari-san and Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll call Komari-san and Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、来てくれるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm pretty sure they'll come.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm pretty sure they'll come.

MESSAGE.JP: メールを送ると、すぐに返ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I sent the mail, I got a reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I sent the mail, I got a reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 『おっけーですよー（＾▽＾）』
『分かりました』
MESSAGE.EN: [Understood].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Understood].

MESSAGE.JP: 色よい返事で良かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was glad they were both positive replies.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was glad they were both positive replies.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんと西園さんが来てくれるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san and Nishizono-san are coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san and Nishizono-san are coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは軽く頷いただけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san just gave a light nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san just gave a light nod.

MESSAGE.JP: …そういえば西園さんと二木さんの接点はあんまりないのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Come to think of it, I don't think Nishizono-san and Futaki-san have had much contact.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Come to think of it, I don't think Nishizono-san and Futaki-san have had much contact.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことを考えながらふたりを待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about that as I waited for the two of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about that as I waited for the two of them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「呼び出してごめんね、小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry for calling you out, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry for calling you out, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ううん、おっけーですよー。全然問題ないよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No, it's okay. Absolutely no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No, it's okay. Absolutely no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「猫の手も借りたい、ということでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I suppose you must be in a rather dire situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I suppose you must be in a rather dire situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「悪いわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝My apologies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝My apologies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりに向かって軽く頭を下げる二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san bowed her head a little to the two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san bowed her head a little to the two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今日は寮の窓拭きを手伝ってもらえるかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I was thinking we could get you to help us wash the dormitory windows today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I was thinking we could get you to help us wash the dormitory windows today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「基本的に、自分たちのことは自分でというのが寮の規則だというのは知っていると思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Basically, the rule is that everyone is supposed to take care of their own dorm windows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Basically, the rule is that everyone is supposed to take care of their own dorm windows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「実際はなかなか進んでやってくれる人もいないのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝But in reality there are few people who actually do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝But in reality there are few people who actually do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しょうがないよー。やっぱり手が回らないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I guess it can't be helped. Everyone's just too busy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I guess it can't be helped. Everyone's just too busy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「掃除担当の人もひとが沢山いるわけじゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And there aren't that many people in charge of overseeing the cleaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And there aren't that many people in charge of overseeing the cleaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「本当はお休みの日にやらないとダメだよねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's really something that needs to be done on a day off, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's really something that needs to be done on a day off, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「かなちゃんは偉いねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You're such a good girl, Kana-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You're such a good girl, Kana-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…かなちゃん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Kana-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Kana-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず慣れないようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She hasn't come to terms with being called this way, yet...
MESSAGE.Translation: She hasn't come to terms with being called this way, yet...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん。二木さんは佳奈多さんだからかなちゃんなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep. Futaki-san is Kanata-san, so ❛Kana-chan.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep. Futaki-san is Kanata-san, so ❛Kana-chan.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは不満そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san looked disgruntled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san looked disgruntled.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、小毬さんはほわほわ笑顔のまま。
MESSAGE.EN: But, Komari-san just kept smiling warmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, Komari-san just kept smiling warmly.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…というわけで早速作業に掛かってくれないかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝... Anyhow, can I ask you to get started right away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝... Anyhow, can I ask you to get started right away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それについては触れない、ということで妥協を図ったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed she was making a compromise by ignoring the nickname thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed she was making a compromise by ignoring the nickname thing.

MESSAGE.JP: クドといい人懐っこい性格のひとには弱いのかも。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking Kud into account, I think she might be weak against friendly people.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking Kud into account, I think she might be weak against friendly people.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん。問題なっしんぐだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay. No biggie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay. No biggie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それじゃーいっしょにがんばろ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Alrighty, let's all do our best～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Alrighty, let's all do our best～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすが小毬さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected of Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected of Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 極めて自然に二木さんに接することができている。
MESSAGE.EN: She naturally got along with Futaki-san right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She naturally got along with Futaki-san right away.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ところで、一口に寮の窓拭きと言っても何をすればいいんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝By the way, though you said we should help wash the windows, what exactly are we going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝By the way, though you said we should help wash the windows, what exactly are we going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あと、道具などを貸していただかないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Also, we'll need some tools in order to work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Also, we'll need some tools in order to work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そうね。…もちろん各自の部屋はその部屋の人の責任だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well... Obviously each room is the responsibility of the person living there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well... Obviously each room is the responsibility of the person living there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「今日お願いしたいのは、男女の寮の廊下ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What I'd like you to take care of today are the hallway windows in the male and female dorms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What I'd like you to take care of today are the hallway windows in the male and female dorms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それなりの量になるから効率よくやりましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝There are quite a few of them, so we'll need to be as efficient as possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝There are quite a few of them, so we'll need to be as efficient as possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、二木さんは雑巾やガラスクリーナー、バケツを用意する。
MESSAGE.EN: After that Futaki-san prepared some buckets, cloth and glass cleaning solution.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that Futaki-san prepared some buckets, cloth and glass cleaning solution.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…二木さん。古新聞はありませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Futaki-san. Are there any old newspapers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Futaki-san. Are there any old newspapers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ああ、そうね。先生に訊けば、どこかにあるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Ah, right. I'm sure the teachers will know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Ah, right. I'm sure the teachers will know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「古新聞なんて、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you going to do with old newspapers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you going to do with old newspapers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まさか掃除の合間に読んで暇を潰すわけじゃないだろうし。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think there'd be enough free time while cleaning to sit down and read.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think there'd be enough free time while cleaning to sit down and read.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「新聞を濡らしたもので最初に窓を拭くと、汚れが綺麗に落ちます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you wipe the windows with a wet newspaper first, the dirt will come off much better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you wipe the windows with a wet newspaper first, the dirt will come off much better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「インクが汚れを吸着するんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The ink absorbs the grime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The ink absorbs the grime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ついでにガラスのつや出しまでしてくれる、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And it helps bring out the shine in the glass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And it helps bring out the shine in the glass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「西園さんは物知りね。…それとも、おばあちゃんの知恵袋かしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're quite knowledgeable, Nishizono-san... Or, perhaps it's wisdom handed down by your grandmother?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're quite knowledgeable, Nishizono-san... Or, perhaps it's wisdom handed down by your grandmother?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 珍しく二木さんが冗談を言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Amazingly, Futaki-san made a joke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amazingly, Futaki-san made a joke.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「二木さんもご存知だったのなら、同等かと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You knew about it as well, Futaki-san, so the same applies to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You knew about it as well, Futaki-san, so the same applies to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…それもそうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I suppose that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I suppose that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえー、知らなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue-, I didn't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue-, I didn't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに…この二人だったら、余計なことも色々と知ってそうだよなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: True... between the two of them, I'm sure those two know all sorts of random trivia.
MESSAGE.Translation: True... between the two of them, I'm sure those two know all sorts of random trivia.

MESSAGE.JP: 古新聞も用意して、僕たちは寮の中をまわることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: We got some old newspapers and started walking around the dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: We got some old newspapers and started walking around the dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: まずは男子寮から。
MESSAGE.EN: We started with the male dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: We started with the male dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…汚いですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's fairly dirty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's fairly dirty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was true....
MESSAGE.Translation: That was true....

MESSAGE.JP: ガラスをちょっと斜めから見ると、光の加減で汚れがよく分かる。
MESSAGE.EN: If you looked at the glass from an angle, you could easily tell by the light how dirty the glass was.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you looked at the glass from an angle, you could easily tell by the light how dirty the glass was.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがガラスに息を吹きかけると、白く曇る。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san breathed on the glass, leaving white fog on the surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san breathed on the glass, leaving white fog on the surface.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、何か文字が浮かび上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: And after a moment some writing appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: And after a moment some writing appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 冬や雨の日に結露してできる即席の黒板に落書きがしてあるのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: On winter or rainy days, the foggy windows were like impromptu blackboards, so they were always being written on.
MESSAGE.Translation: On winter or rainy days, the foggy windows were like impromptu blackboards, so they were always being written on.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰がやるんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder who did it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder who did it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「まるで子供ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝How childish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝How childish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『筋肉』
MESSAGE.EN: [Muscle]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Muscle]

MESSAGE.EN: [has appeared!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [has appeared!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 『帰った！』
MESSAGE.EN: [and returned!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [and returned!]

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてか書いた集団が誰かわかる気がするぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I had the feeling I knew just who had written these...
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I had the feeling I knew just who had written these...

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「せっかく来たのに帰ったのかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So they returned right after they appeared?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So they returned right after they appeared?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは落書きにつっこみを入れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was evaluating the graffiti.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was evaluating the graffiti.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「骨と肉はどうなったのよ。一緒に帰ってあげなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What will happen to their flesh and bones? They should go back together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What will happen to their flesh and bones? They should go back together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …理屈に合わないことにはついつっこみたくなるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It seemed like she couldn't resist commenting on anything she found illogical.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It seemed like she couldn't resist commenting on anything she found illogical.

MESSAGE.JP: にしたって、二木さんも意外と（？）変だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking about it, Futaki-san was a little stranger herself than I would have thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking about it, Futaki-san was a little stranger herself than I would have thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「てきぱきー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's do this presto!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's do this presto!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何故か嬉しそうな小毬さんがすでに作業を始めている。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san seemed to be enjoying herself as she began working.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san seemed to be enjoying herself as she began working.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ため息を吐いても仕方がないですし、やりましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It'll do no good sighing over it, let's begin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It'll do no good sighing over it, let's begin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕、二木さん、小毬さん、西園さんの四人で掃除を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: The four of us began to clean: Myself, Futaki-san, Komari-san and Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: The four of us began to clean: Myself, Futaki-san, Komari-san and Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 古新聞を水に浸してから絞る。
MESSAGE.EN: I dipped an old newspaper in water and wrung it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dipped an old newspaper in water and wrung it out.

MESSAGE.JP: まずはそれで窓ガラスを拭いて、埃などを落とす。
MESSAGE.EN: First we wiped the glass with that to pick up the dust.
MESSAGE.Translation: First we wiped the glass with that to pick up the dust.

MESSAGE.JP: それから水に濡れた雑巾で力を入れてこすって、さらには乾いた雑巾でカラ拭き。
MESSAGE.EN: Then we would wipe it down more thoroughly with a wet rag, finally polishing it dry with a dry rag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then we would wipe it down more thoroughly with a wet rag, finally polishing it dry with a dry rag.

MESSAGE.JP: 汚れがひどい箇所にはガラスクリーナーを使う。
MESSAGE.EN: In the places the smudges were really bad, we would use glass cleaner.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the places the smudges were really bad, we would use glass cleaner.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふぅ、たいへんだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Phew, this is hard work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Phew, this is hard work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか嬉しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She still seemed happy for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: She still seemed happy for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なかなか力が要りますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It takes quite a bit of strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It takes quite a bit of strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でもまだまだてきぱきー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But we still gotta do it presto.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But we still gotta do it presto.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、携帯の着信音が響く。
MESSAGE.EN: And, suddenly her cellphone rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, suddenly her cellphone rang.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃんからメールだ。『てきぱきってなに？』だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's a message from Haru-chan. ❛What does ❝presto❞ mean?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's a message from Haru-chan. ❛What does ❝presto❞ mean?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「中国古代の異民族『狄（てき）』と覇王の気、すなわち『狄覇気』のことだと返しておいてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's an Old English word for ❛thunderstorm,❜ ❛pre❜ as in before, ❛sto❜ from storm. Thus, an oncoming storm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's an Old English word for ❛thunderstorm,❜ ❛pre❜ as in before, ❛sto❜ from storm. Thus, an oncoming storm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そうなんだー。返すよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Is that what it is? I'll let her know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Is that what it is? I'll let her know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大嘘だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That is one big fat lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is one big fat lie.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「『ありがとー！（≧▽≦）』だってー。いいことすると気持ちがいいねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She says ❛Thank you-!（≧▽≦）.❜ It feels good to do good things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She says ❛Thank you-!（≧▽≦）.❜ It feels good to do good things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ふう、腰が痛くなってきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Phew, my back is starting to hurt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Phew, my back is starting to hurt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこはスルーなのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So she's just going to let it slide...
MESSAGE.Translation: So she's just going to let it slide...

MESSAGE.JP: あとで小毬さんにも真実を教えておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll have to tell Komari-san the truth later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll have to tell Komari-san the truth later.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ちょっと、こっちお願い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Could I get a hand over here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Could I get a hand over here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくやってると、僕も腰が痛くなってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After working for a while, my back was starting to ache too.
MESSAGE.Translation: After working for a while, my back was starting to ache too.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風にして、男子寮の１階から、順番に掃除をしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, we finished the first floor of the boys' dorm one window at a time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, we finished the first floor of the boys' dorm one window at a time.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子寮が終わったら、女子寮へ。
MESSAGE.EN: After we finished the male side, we headed for the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: After we finished the male side, we headed for the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮の方は、さすがに男子寮ほど汚くはなく、多少は楽ができた。
MESSAGE.EN: As you'd expect, the girls' dorms weren't quite as bad as the boys', so our work was a little easier.
MESSAGE.Translation: As you'd expect, the girls' dorms weren't quite as bad as the boys', so our work was a little easier.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、一通り終われば結構疲れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, by the time we were done I was pretty tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, by the time we were done I was pretty tired.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「こんなところかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I suppose that should do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I suppose that should do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんがオッケーを出した頃には、陽も暮れかけていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When Futaki-san gave us the okay, the sun was already setting.
MESSAGE.Translation: When Futaki-san gave us the okay, the sun was already setting.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ご苦労様」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「かなちゃんもお疲れさまー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You too, Kana-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You too, Kana-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お疲れ様でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good work everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good work everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二人ともありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんと西園さんは自室に帰っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san and Nishizono-san returned to their rooms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san and Nishizono-san returned to their rooms.

MESSAGE.JP: それを見送る二木さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san saw them both off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san saw them both off.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと驚いたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was a little surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was a little surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「何が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝At what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝At what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、西園さんたちと普通に話してたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's just that you were able to converse with them normally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's just that you were able to converse with them normally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「同じ学年なんだもの、話すことはあるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We're in the same year at school, there is nothing strange about us talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We're in the same year at school, there is nothing strange about us talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはそうなんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well that's true, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well that's true, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…親しくはないわね。クラスも違うし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...We're not very close. And we are in different classes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...We're not very close. And we are in different classes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ただ西園さんには感謝してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's just that I'm grateful to Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's just that I'm grateful to Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「感謝？　なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Grateful? What for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Grateful? What for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「彼女に事情があるように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just like she has her circumstances,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just like she has her circumstances,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私にも事情があるのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have mine.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたには関係ない話よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それじゃあ戻りましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Well then, shall we head back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Well then, shall we head back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはさっさと寮長室へ向かおうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san headed quickly back to the dorm council room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san headed quickly back to the dorm council room.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は慌てて後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly chased after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly chased after her.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんと葉留佳さんを呼んでみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I'll try asking Kurugaya-san and Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I'll try asking Kurugaya-san and Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …あのふたりは手伝ってくれるだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...will those two really come and help?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...will those two really come and help?

MESSAGE.JP: 少し不安に思いながらも、メールを送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent them a mail, a little worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent them a mail, a little worried.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…決まった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Did you decide?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Did you decide?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。来ヶ谷さんと葉留佳さんを呼ぶよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I invited Kurugaya-san and Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I invited Kurugaya-san and Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『いやだめんどくさい』
MESSAGE.EN: [I don't want to, it sounds troublesome].
MESSAGE.Translation: [I don't want to, it sounds troublesome].

MESSAGE.JP: 『えー。めどーい(≧△≦)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Ehhh. Too work-y(≧△≦)].
MESSAGE.Translation: [Ehhh. Too work-y(≧△≦)].

MESSAGE.JP: 同じような返信がきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Their responses were similar.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their responses were similar.

MESSAGE.JP: なんてやる気のないふたりだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how lazy were those two....
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how lazy were those two....

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…案の定というか、なんというか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Pretty much what I expected to hear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Pretty much what I expected to hear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「なんて返信が来たの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What was their reply?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What was their reply?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまぁその…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, well, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, well, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うっ。微かに二木さんの額に青筋が見えたような。
MESSAGE.EN: Uuu. I felt like I could see veins standing out faintly on Futaki-san's head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Uuu. I felt like I could see veins standing out faintly on Futaki-san's head.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…来ヶ谷さんに、『洗濯室の掃除』と伝えて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Tell Kurugaya-san ❛we're cleaning the laundry room.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Tell Kurugaya-san ❛we're cleaning the laundry room.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん、いいけど…葉留佳さんは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, alright, that's fine... what about Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, alright, that's fine... what about Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私が呼び出すわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'll call her myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'll call her myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは取りだした携帯を打ち始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san began to tap away at a cellphone she had pulled out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san began to tap away at a cellphone she had pulled out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…ん…二木さん、葉留佳さんのメアド、知ってるのか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Hm... I guess Futaki-san knows Haruka-san's mail address.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Hm... I guess Futaki-san knows Haruka-san's mail address.)

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず来ヶ谷さんに送る。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I should send a message to Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I should send a message to Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「洗濯室で、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛Meet us at the laundry room.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛Meet us at the laundry room.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『女子寮の洗濯室か？　了解した』
MESSAGE.EN: [The female dorm's laundry room? Understood.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [The female dorm's laundry room? Understood.]

MESSAGE.JP: はやっ。返信が来た。
MESSAGE.EN: Woah. Her reply came so fast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Woah. Her reply came so fast.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、オッケーだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san said okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san said okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんの返事は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did Haruka-san say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did Haruka-san say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん…って、もう歩き出してるしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... hey, she's already walking off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san... hey, she's already walking off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて二木さんの後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly followed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly followed her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはー、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yaha-, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yaha-, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、二木女史と一緒だったのか、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, so you were together with Miss Futaki, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, so you were together with Miss Futaki, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「呼び出してごめんね、葉留佳さん、来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry for calling you out, Haruka-san and Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry for calling you out, Haruka-san and Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「い、いいよ、別に。暇だったしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I, it's fine. I wasn't doing anything anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I, it's fine. I wasn't doing anything anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「右に同じだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ditto for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ditto for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりとも乗り気になってくれたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looks like both of them had decided to help out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looks like both of them had decided to help out.

MESSAGE.JP: 何が原因かはわからないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really know why, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really know why, though.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「洗濯室の掃除をお願いしたいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'd like to ask you to help us clean the laundry room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'd like to ask you to help us clean the laundry room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私は何をすればいい？　可愛い下着の物色か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What should I do? Hunt for some cute underwear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What should I do? Hunt for some cute underwear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: この人を呼んだのは間違いだった気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I got the feeling it had been a mistake to call her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got the feeling it had been a mistake to call her.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「床の掃除、ランドリー機械のチェック、窓ガラス拭きなどですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We need to sweep the floors, check all the laundry machines, and wash the windows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We need to sweep the floors, check all the laundry machines, and wash the windows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはクリップボードに挟んだリストをめくりながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san listed the points as she flipped through a checklist on her clipboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san listed the points as she flipped through a checklist on her clipboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、めんどくさいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, sounds troublesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, sounds troublesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「というわけで、じゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And so, later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And so, later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: And she turned to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she turned to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ってダメだよっ!!　せっかくここまできたんだから手伝ってってよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, don't run off!! You came all the way out here, you might as well help!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, don't run off!! You came all the way out here, you might as well help!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ところで理樹君がこんなところの掃除をしてるのは問題ないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Actually, isn't there something wrong with Riki-kun cleaning over here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Actually, isn't there something wrong with Riki-kun cleaning over here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、仕事だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? No, it's my job after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? No, it's my job after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか。責任感が強いのはいいことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well, having a strong sense of duty is good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well, having a strong sense of duty is good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが、私の嫌いな言葉は一番が『責任』で二番が『努力』なのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But, the words I hate the most are, first: ❛duty❜ and second: ❛effort.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But, the words I hate the most are, first: ❛duty❜ and second: ❛effort.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「というわけで、サラバだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And thus, farewell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And thus, farewell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She went to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…いいですよ、別に来ヶ谷さんの手伝いなんてなくても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...It's fine, it isn't like we really need Kurugaya-san to help anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...It's fine, it isn't like we really need Kurugaya-san to help anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私たちで十分ですから、どーぞお引取りを」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝We'll be fine without you, so please feel free to leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝We'll be fine without you, so please feel free to leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「む、そう言われてしまうと、私としても多少心が揺らぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mu, if you say it that way, even my heart can't help but waver.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mu, if you say it that way, even my heart can't help but waver.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 天邪鬼なひとだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: How contrary can you be...
MESSAGE.Translation: How contrary can you be...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まぁまぁ、あね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝W, well, Ane...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝W, well, Ane...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御、さくっとやっちゃいましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, let's just get it over with as fast as we can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, let's just get it over with as fast as we can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんにしては珍しく前向きだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san seemed unusually enthused.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san seemed unusually enthused.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは微かに鼻を鳴らした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san snickered lightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san snickered lightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは葉留佳さんと二木さんを見比べて微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san looked between Futaki-san and Haruka-san and smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san looked between Futaki-san and Haruka-san and smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうだな。効率的な窓ガラス拭きというものを見せてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I see. You shall see what efficient window washing looks like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I see. You shall see what efficient window washing looks like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおー。期待してますよーぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oooh, I wanna see that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oooh, I wanna see that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バケツを用意した葉留佳さんは雑巾を水に入れて絞っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san got some buckets, then dipped a rag in the water and wrung it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san got some buckets, then dipped a rag in the water and wrung it out.

MESSAGE.JP: それにしても、女子寮の洗濯室は男子寮のそれと違ってきれいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That said, the laundry room in the girls' dorm was way cleaner than the boys' side.
MESSAGE.Translation: That said, the laundry room in the girls' dorm was way cleaner than the boys' side.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あ、乾燥機も最新のっぽい）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah, the dryers here look really new.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah, the dryers here look really new.)

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あんまりじろじろ見るものじゃないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You're not supposed to be staring so much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You're not supposed to be staring so much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 機械を見ていた二木さんがぼそっと呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san muttered that absent-mindedly as I was looking at the machines.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san muttered that absent-mindedly as I was looking at the machines.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも男子寮の洗濯機ってさ、二層式のがまだ残ってるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, the washing machines we have in the boys' dorm are pretty second-rate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, the washing machines we have in the boys' dorm are pretty second-rate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「男子寮もリフォームが終われば同じようなものが据え付けられるんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Won't they replace those with this same model once the renovation in the boys' dorm is over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Won't they replace those with this same model once the renovation in the boys' dorm is over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 紙に何かをメモしながら二木さんは何台もある機械を見て回っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was walking around looking at several of the machines while making notes on her clipboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was walking around looking at several of the machines while making notes on her clipboard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は何をしようかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「可愛い下着の物色を任せた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hunt for some cute underwear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hunt for some cute underwear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあっ、思わずうなずいてしまったっ!!　やらないからそんなことっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaah, I nodded without thinking!! I can't do something like that!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaah, I nodded without thinking!! I can't do something like that!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ雑巾がけでもしながら発見次第こっそり懐に忍ばせるなどするといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you can mop the floor, then when you come across some you can secretly hide them away in your pocket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you can mop the floor, then when you come across some you can secretly hide them away in your pocket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「後者はしないけど、前者はやるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll do that first thing, but not the rest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll do that first thing, but not the rest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雑巾を手にとって、僕は床を拭き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed a mop and started mopping the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed a mop and started mopping the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「佳奈多君のぱんつが見えるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can see Kanata-kun's panties.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can see Kanata-kun's panties.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そ、そんなとこ見ないでくださいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝P, please don't look!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝P, please don't look!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ぴら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Flip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Flip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声にならない抗議が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear protests that weren't quite voiced.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear protests that weren't quite voiced.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、スカートめくりくらいでそんなに怒るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh come on, don't get so angry at someone just flipping up your skirt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh come on, don't get so angry at someone just flipping up your skirt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、余計なものに惑わされるな、直枝理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, don't let yourself be led astray, Riki Naoe...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, don't let yourself be led astray, Riki Naoe...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ…理樹君のおしりから太ももに掛けてのラインは男の子にしておくのがもったいないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... I think the wonderful line from Riki-kun's butt to his thigh is wasted on a boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... I think the wonderful line from Riki-kun's butt to his thigh is wasted on a boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「思わないでよっ!!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't think about that!!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't think about that!!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕自身すら危ういのかっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even I was in danger, apparently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even I was in danger, apparently.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あれ…で、私は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Huh... then, what about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Huh... then, what about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっとセクシーなポーズで姉御のツッコミをお待ちしておりますヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then I'll just strike a sorta sexy pose and wait for Anego's comment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then I'll just strike a sorta sexy pose and wait for Anego's comment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ええぇーっ、なんで私だけ無反応なんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehhhh, how come only I don't get a reaction?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehhhh, how come only I don't get a reaction?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君のうなじがせくしーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The nape of Riki-kun's neck is so sexy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The nape of Riki-kun's neck is so sexy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにーっ!!　せくしー度で理樹くんに負けたぁーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What!! I lost to Riki-kun in sexiness!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What!! I lost to Riki-kun in sexiness!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 要するにこの人は、根が天邪鬼な上に反応が面白い人じゃないとからかわないんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: To put it simply, Kurugaya-san was the perverse sort that wouldn't tease a person unless she could get an interesting reaction out of them...
MESSAGE.Translation: To put it simply, Kurugaya-san was the perverse sort that wouldn't tease a person unless she could get an interesting reaction out of them...

MESSAGE.JP: そして葉留佳さんは放置したほうが面白いから扱いが悪くなっているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And when she realized ignoring Haruka-san would prompt a better reaction, she had decided to treat her like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: And when she realized ignoring Haruka-san would prompt a better reaction, she had decided to treat her like that.

MESSAGE.JP: …難儀な人だと改めて思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I once again decided she was a very difficult person to deal with.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I once again decided she was a very difficult person to deal with.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふーっ。おしまーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Phew. All done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Phew. All done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「流石姉御ですヨ。外国のメイドさんっぽかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝As expected of Anego. You were just like a foreign maid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝As expected of Anego. You were just like a foreign maid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、乙女のたしなみというやつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Of course, this is something a lady should be able to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Of course, this is something a lady should be able to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御はいいお嫁さんになれますねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego will be a good wife someday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego will be a good wife someday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「婿どのに直伝しておいてあとは眺めていたいところだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'd like to just pass my skills on to my husband and sit by watching, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'd like to just pass my skills on to my husband and sit by watching, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おー、それもなんかかっこいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ohhh, that's sorta cool too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ohhh, that's sorta cool too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「葉留佳君、終わったことを二木女史に報告してきてくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Haruka-kun, please report to Miss Futaki that our mission is accomplished.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Haruka-kun, please report to Miss Futaki that our mission is accomplished.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいあい、ラジャー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Aye aye, roger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Aye aye, roger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃがみこんでコンセントを調べている二木さんのほうへ葉留佳さんが話しかけに行く。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san went over to speak with Futaki-san, who was squatting down investigating an electrical outlet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san went over to speak with Futaki-san, who was squatting down investigating an electrical outlet.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…やれやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Good grief.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Good grief.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの、来ヶ谷さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up, Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up, Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雑巾をしぼりながら、僕は顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked from the cloth I was wringing out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked from the cloth I was wringing out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はやく終わったみたいだね。おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like we finished pretty fast. Thanks for the help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like we finished pretty fast. Thanks for the help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「実際のところ、私はそんなにやってないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Actually, I didn't really do much myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Actually, I didn't really do much myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あぁ。私は指示していただけだ。葉留佳君がはりきっていたからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. All I did was give out orders. Haruka-kun was really giving it her all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. All I did was give out orders. Haruka-kun was really giving it her all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ま、楽だったからありがたかったが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it was easy like that, so I guess I should be grateful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it was easy like that, so I guess I should be grateful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ…掃除をお願いしたメールでは『めどーい』って書いてたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh... when I sent her the mail asking for her help she replied that it was ❛too work-y.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh... when I sent her the mail asking for her help she replied that it was ❛too work-y.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんな気持ちの変化があったんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder what kind of change of heart she had.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder what kind of change of heart she had.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それは決まっているだろう。役に立つところを見せたかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think that's obvious. She wanted to show that she could be useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think that's obvious. She wanted to show that she could be useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…え？　誰に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh? She wanted to show that to who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh? She wanted to show that to who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは軽く肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san gave a small shrug.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san gave a small shrug.

MESSAGE.JP: 視線の先を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked where she was looking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked where she was looking.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ふーん。そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Hmmm. Is that so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Hmmm. Is that so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…そうなんだよ、それでね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Yes it is, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Yes it is, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 素っ気ない返事の二木さんに話しかけている葉留佳さんがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was talking with Futaki-san, who was only giving the most curt replies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was talking with Futaki-san, who was only giving the most curt replies.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さんって、二木さんに腰、引けてない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san... afraid of Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is Haruka-san... afraid of Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「単に接し方がわからないだけだよ、あれは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She doesn't know how to interact with her easily, is all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She doesn't know how to interact with her easily, is all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「初めて葉留佳君と話したときもあんな感じだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was like that the first time Haruka-kun spoke to me, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was like that the first time Haruka-kun spoke to me, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうでもいい話を長々としたり、よくわからない話題を振ったり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She kept talking about nonsense, or pointless things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She kept talking about nonsense, or pointless things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それは今でも変わらないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I guess that hasn't changed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I guess that hasn't changed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「勝手に話を切り上げて自己完結してしまう癖も直ってないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like she hasn't fixed her habit of coming to some conclusion in her head and cutting off the conversation, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like she hasn't fixed her habit of coming to some conclusion in her head and cutting off the conversation, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「話すきっかけって、来ヶ谷さんが硬貨を拾ってあげたんだっけね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The reason you two started talking was because you had picked up some coins for her, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The reason you two started talking was because you had picked up some coins for her, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん。あれもな。困っているなら誰かに助けを求めればいいわけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. That was strange too. She could have just asked someone for help if she needed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. That was strange too. She could have just asked someone for help if she needed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それを知らないかのようだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But it was like she didn't even realize she could do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But it was like she didn't even realize she could do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何もできない、というのは悩みなのだろうが…思いこみなのだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Maybe she is worried about her own helplessness... making all sorts of assumptions about herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Maybe she is worried about her own helplessness... making all sorts of assumptions about herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、それはいい。佳奈多君がまたにらんでいるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, whatever. Kanata-kun is scowling at us again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, whatever. Kanata-kun is scowling at us again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ほんとだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御ー、もう解散していいそうですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, looks like we're done here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, looks like we're done here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか。というわけで、少年、私は行くとするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well then, young man, I'll be taking my leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. Well then, young man, I'll be taking my leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、おつかれさま、来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks for your help, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks for your help, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかしこのひと、真面目にやってれば頼れるいい人なんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: She can be rather dependable when not fooling around...
MESSAGE.Translation: She can be rather dependable when not fooling around...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「寮長室で食券もらえるらしいですよ、姉御」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Looks like we can pick up our meal ticket in the dorm heads' room, Anego.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Looks like we can pick up our meal ticket in the dorm heads' room, Anego.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「貰いにいきませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wanna go pick them up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wanna go pick them up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それは葉留佳君に任せる。ではな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll leave that to you, Haruka-kun. See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll leave that to you, Haruka-kun. See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そういえばさっき言ってた小毬ちゃんが無くしたぱんつ、見つかったんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, come to think of it, did you find Komari-chan's lost panties?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, come to think of it, did you find Komari-chan's lost panties?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ってもういない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And she's already gone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And she's already gone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おいてけぼりはいやだよぅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't leave me behind～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't leave me behind～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あっという間にふたりは去って行った。
MESSAGE.EN: And before long the two of them had left.
MESSAGE.Translation: And before long the two of them had left.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What was that about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What was that about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして睨むのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's with that glare...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's with that glare...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「来ヶ谷さんと何を喋っていたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝What were you talking about with Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝What were you talking about with Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、特には…。葉留佳さんがやけに張り切ってたね、とかそんな程度の話だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, well, nothing really... Just about how enthusiastic Haruka-san was, and stuff like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, well, nothing really... Just about how enthusiastic Haruka-san was, and stuff like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…張り切ってたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Enthusiastic?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Enthusiastic?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは眉根を寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san's brows drew together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san's brows drew together.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「いつも、そんな調子だとありがたいんだけどね、あの子も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'd be grateful if that girl were to act like that all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'd be grateful if that girl were to act like that all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小言っぽい台詞のわりには、口調はとても優しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though it was worded like a rebuke, her tone was remarkably gentle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though it was worded like a rebuke, her tone was remarkably gentle.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは。たまには葉留佳さんもやる気を出すってことかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha. I guess it just means that even Haruka-san feels like helping out sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha. I guess it just means that even Haruka-san feels like helping out sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…戻りましょうか。仕事も終わったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Shall we go back. Our work here is done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Shall we go back. Our work here is done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんと一緒に寮長室へ戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san and I headed back for the dorm heads' room together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san and I headed back for the dorm heads' room together.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「おかえり、二木さん、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Welcome back, Futaki-san, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Welcome back, Futaki-san, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 作業を全部終わらせて寮長室へ帰ると、寮長以外は誰もいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: When we arrived back at the dorm heads' room after finishing all our work, just the girls' dorm head was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we arrived back at the dorm heads' room after finishing all our work, just the girls' dorm head was there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　他のひとたちは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Where's everyone else?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Where's everyone else?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「一通り終わったから帰ってもらったわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Everything's been pretty much finished, so they headed home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Everything's been pretty much finished, so they headed home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「あなたたちで最後」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You guys are the last ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You guys are the last ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「おつかれさまです、あーちゃん先輩」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Good work, A-chan-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Good work, A-chan-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「おつかれさま。はい、二木さん、直枝くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help. Here you go, Futaki-san, Naoe-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Thanks for your help. Here you go, Futaki-san, Naoe-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんですか、これ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「どっちか好きなほうあげるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'll give you whichever you prefer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'll give you whichever you prefer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「チケット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A ticket?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A ticket?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見たところ、学食の食券と、映画のチケットのようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: From what I could see, there was a meal ticket and a movie ticket.
MESSAGE.Translation: From what I could see, there was a meal ticket and a movie ticket.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「土日ご飯券…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A weekend meal ticket...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A weekend meal ticket...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 土日のお昼だけ１回のメニューがただになる券らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was for one free lunch on a weekend, apparently.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was for one free lunch on a weekend, apparently.

MESSAGE.JP: 映画のほうは、フリーチケットで、指定券ではないっぽい。
MESSAGE.EN: The movie ticket was just a free ticket, and wasn't for any specific flick.
MESSAGE.Translation: The movie ticket was just a free ticket, and wasn't for any specific flick.

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「どっち？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Which one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Which one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どっちにしよう？
MESSAGE.EN: Which should I pick?
MESSAGE.Translation: Which should I pick?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食券にします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take the meal ticket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take the meal ticket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これって、有効期限は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When does this expire?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When does this expire?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「再来週の土日までかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I believe it's good until the weekend after next.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I believe it's good until the weekend after next.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会って太っ腹なんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm committee is pretty generous, isn't it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm committee is pretty generous, isn't it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ふふ、言ってくれるわね。でも、苦肉の策なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Fufu, it's just as you say. But, it was a bit of a desperate move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Fufu, it's just as you say. But, it was a bit of a desperate move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「人手足りないからね。今回も色々なひとに無理をいって頼んだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝We just don't have enough people. So this time we had to beg a bunch of people to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝We just don't have enough people. So this time we had to beg a bunch of people to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So that's how it was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So that's how it was...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ささやかな報酬よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's not really that great of a reward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's not really that great of a reward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「たまにはこれぐらいの役得はないとね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Sometimes you just gotta have some kind of incentive, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Sometimes you just gotta have some kind of incentive, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「寮会ＯＢアンドＯＧたちの寄付金から出ているので感謝するよーに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It mostly comes from donations made by dorm committee alumni, so we should be grateful to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It mostly comes from donations made by dorm committee alumni, so we should be grateful to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかりました。ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I understand. Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I understand. Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二木さんはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Which would you like, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Which would you like, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どっちも要りません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't need either of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't need either of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「言うと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝That's what I figured you'd say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝That's what I figured you'd say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「じゃ直枝くんに食券２枚ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Well then I'll give Naoe-kun two meal tickets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Well then I'll give Naoe-kun two meal tickets.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二木さんに受け取らせるかしないかはあなたの自由よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You can try to get Futaki-san to take one of them, or not, it's up to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You can try to get Futaki-san to take one of them, or not, it's up to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ふたりとも帰って良し。解散」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You two can head home now. Dismissed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You two can head home now. Dismissed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は笑うと、寮長室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head left the room with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head left the room with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん、これ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, this ticket...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, this ticket...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ルームメイトにあげたら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why don't you give it to your roommate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why don't you give it to your roommate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は要らないから。今日はおつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have no need for it. Good work, today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have no need for it. Good work, today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと二木さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, w, wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, w, wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはさっさと歩き去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san took off walking in a hurry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san took off walking in a hurry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんだかなぁ。まぁ、いいか…真人にあげよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's up with that? Well, whatever... guess I'll give it to Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's up with that? Well, whatever... guess I'll give it to Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 食券を財布に入れて、部屋へ戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the meal tickets in my wallet, and headed back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the meal tickets in my wallet, and headed back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「映画チケットにします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take the movie ticket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take the movie ticket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これって、有効期限は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Does this have an expiration date?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Does this have an expiration date?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「今月末までじゃなかったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I believe it's good until the end of the month.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I believe it's good until the end of the month.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「商店街のミニシアター用だから確認は自分でしてみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's for the mini-theater in the shopping arcade, so you can confirm it when you're going there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's for the mini-theater in the shopping arcade, so you can confirm it when you're going there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会って太っ腹なんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm committee is pretty openhanded, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm committee is pretty openhanded, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ふふ、言ってくれるわね。でも、苦肉の策なのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Fufu, it's just as you say. But, it was a bit of a desperate move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Fufu, it's just as you say. But, it was a bit of a desperate move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「人手足りないからね。今回も色々なひとに無理をいって頼んだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝We just don't have enough people. So this time we had to beg a bunch of people to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝We just don't have enough people. So this time we had to beg a bunch of people to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So that's how it was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So that's how it was...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ささやかな報酬よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's not really that great of a reward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's not really that great of a reward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「たまにはこれぐらいの役得はないとね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But sometimes you just gotta have some kind of incentive, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But sometimes you just gotta have some kind of incentive, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「寮会ＯＢアンドＯＧたちの寄付金から出ているので感謝するよーに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It mostly comes from donations made by dorm committee alumni, so we should be grateful to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It mostly comes from donations made by dorm committee alumni, so we should be grateful to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかりました。ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I understand. Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I understand. Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二木さんはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Which would you like, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Which would you like, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…どっちも要りません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I don't need either of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I don't need either of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「…言うと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝...I figured you'd say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝...I figured you'd say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「じゃ直枝くんに映画券２枚ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Well then, I'll give Naoe-kun two movie tickets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Well then, I'll give Naoe-kun two movie tickets.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「二木さんに受け取らせるかしないかはあなたの自由よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's up to you if you want to try and get Futaki-san to take one or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's up to you if you want to try and get Futaki-san to take one or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `寮長@「ふたりとも帰って良し。解散」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝You two can take off now. Dismissed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝You two can take off now. Dismissed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長は笑うと、寮長室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head left the room with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head left the room with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん、これ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, this ticket...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, this ticket...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「誰か他の子にあげたら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why don't you give it to some other girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why don't you give it to some other girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私は映画興味ないから。今日はおつかれさま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I have no interest in movies. Good work, today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I have no interest in movies. Good work, today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと二木さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, w, wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, w, wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはさっさと歩き去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san hurriedly took off walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san hurriedly took off walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんだかなぁ。でも、どうしようこれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's up with that? And, what am I supposed to do with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's up with that? And, what am I supposed to do with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 使い道は後で考えるか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd think of how to use it later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd think of how to use it later.

MESSAGE.JP: 映画券を財布に入れて、部屋へ戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the movie tickets into my wallet, and headed back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the movie tickets into my wallet, and headed back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: きがつくと、ひとりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I came to, I was alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I came to, I was alone.

MESSAGE.JP: たくさん、ひとがいるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though there were so many people here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though there were so many people here.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてひとりなんだろう、とぼんやりいつもかんがえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I alone, I was always asking myself, dazed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I alone, I was always asking myself, dazed.

MESSAGE.JP: まわりのこたちは、とてもたのしそうなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though all the kids around me looked like they were having fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though all the kids around me looked like they were having fun.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてひとりなんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I alone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I alone...

MESSAGE.JP: みんなもってるものを、もっていないこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Something everyone else had, I didn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something everyone else had, I didn't.

MESSAGE.JP: それはつらくてかなしいことなのだ、とわかったとき。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that was a terribly painful thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that was a terribly painful thing.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして、と。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked why.

MESSAGE.JP: たずねることばをうしなっていたことにきがついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that I didn't even have the words to ask anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that I didn't even have the words to ask anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ngh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ngh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドから体を起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat up in bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat up in bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枕元の時計を見たら、１０時半過ぎだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the clock by my bedside. It was a little past 10:30.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the clock by my bedside. It was a little past 10:30.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, you're awake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, you're awake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「大丈夫か？　寝言でなにか言ってたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You alright? You were saying something in your sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You alright? You were saying something in your sleep.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: また『夢』を見ていたのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Had I been seeing ❛that❜ dream again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had I been seeing ❛that❜ dream again?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕、何て言ってた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What was I saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What was I saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「真人の体と入れ替わりたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I want to swap bodies with Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I want to swap bodies with Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一番言わないセリフだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's the last thing I would ever say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's the last thing I would ever say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちっ…なんだよ。うなされてるだけで言葉は聞き取れなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tch... what's with that. I couldn't understand what you were saying, but it sounded like a nightmare.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tch... what's with that. I couldn't understand what you were saying, but it sounded like a nightmare.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕立て伏せを始める真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato began to do some push-ups.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato began to do some push-ups.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そういえば…ふっふっ…今日は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come to think of it... fuu fuu... today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come to think of it... fuu fuu... today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「休みだろ？　寝てろよ、理樹…ふっふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is a day off, right? You can go back to sleep, Riki... fuu fuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is a day off, right? You can go back to sleep, Riki... fuu fuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm, that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm, that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「天気もいいことだし、起きることにするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I'll get up anyway, the weather seems nice today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I'll get up anyway, the weather seems nice today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか。じゃ、一緒に遊ぶか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright. Then, you want to hang out with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright. Then, you want to hang out with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は腕立て伏せをやめ、あぐらをかき僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stopped doing push-ups and sat-cross legged looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stopped doing push-ups and sat-cross legged looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: と、そこにノックの音が。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, there was a knock at the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, there was a knock at the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふたりとも、起きてるな。飯を食いに行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So you two are awake. Let's go eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So you two are awake. Let's go eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おっと、そうだった。先に腹ごしらえと行くか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oops, that's right. First things first, we should grab some grub.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oops, that's right. First things first, we should grab some grub.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと遅いけど、朝食にいこう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a little late, but let's go eat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a little late, but let's go eat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そこへ俺参上ーーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝THAT SPOT IS MI――――NE!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝THAT SPOT IS MI――――NE!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドアがばん！と開き、人影がずざーっ！と床を滑ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The door banged open with a slam, and a figure slid in onto the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door banged open with a slam, and a figure slid in onto the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「で、でやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It, it appeared...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It, it appeared...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんな化け物みたいに言うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't say it like I'm some kind of monster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't say it like I'm some kind of monster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふたりきりで遊ぶなんて、断じて俺は許さない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I absolutely won't allow you two to hang out without me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I absolutely won't allow you two to hang out without me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちっ…こいつが入ってくると、オレのほうがまともに思えてきて、調子狂うんだよなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tch... He makes me look like the sensible one and it really throws me off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tch... He makes me look like the sensible one and it really throws me off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まともじゃない自覚があったのか！
MESSAGE.EN: So he knew he's not the most sensible person!
MESSAGE.Translation: So he knew he's not the most sensible person!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、その前にご飯食べに行こうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, before that, let's go eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, before that, let's go eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうふたりを誘った。
MESSAGE.EN: I invited the two of them to come along.
MESSAGE.Translation: I invited the two of them to come along.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、こんなものがあるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, I've got these.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, I've got these.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長からもらった食券を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out the meal tickets I had gotten from the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out the meal tickets I had gotten from the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだそりゃ？　ランチフリーチケット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that? A free lunch ticket?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that? A free lunch ticket?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「土日のお昼だけ、メニューどれでもただになるんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just for a weekend lunch. You can get whatever you want off the menu for free.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just for a weekend lunch. You can get whatever you want off the menu for free.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほぅ、噂には聞いていたが、それがそうだったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝O-ho, I had heard rumors about it. So that's what they look like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝O-ho, I had heard rumors about it. So that's what they look like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会の手伝いをしたら貰えたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm head was handing them out to people who helped her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm head was handing them out to people who helped her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「折角だから、使おう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Since I've got them, let's put them to use.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Since I've got them, let's put them to use.❞

MESSAGE.JP: １１時までちょっと待って学食へ入ればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: We should wait a while and head for the cafeteria around 11.
MESSAGE.Translation: We should wait a while and head for the cafeteria around 11.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつはオレの胃袋が黙ってられねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My stomach ain't gonna stay silent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My stomach ain't gonna stay silent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「胃袋は喋らないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Except it can't talk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Except it can't talk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふ…俺なんて、すでに胃酸がだだもれ状態だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fu, somehow, my gastric juices are overflowing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fu, somehow, my gastric juices are overflowing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「胃かいようだから、それ。病院行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sounds like stomach ulcer. You should go see a doctor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sounds like stomach ulcer. You should go see a doctor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話をしながら学食へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: We kept talking while heading to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kept talking while heading to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、こんなものがあるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, I happened to get these.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, I happened to get these.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長からもらった映画チケットを取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out the movie tickets given by the dorm head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out the movie tickets given by the dorm head.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだそりゃ？　鑑賞フリーチケット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that? Free tickets?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that? Free tickets?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「商店街のミニシアターで映画観られるらしいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems we can use these at the mini theater in the shopping district.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems we can use these at the mini theater in the shopping district.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんなのどこで貰ったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Where did you get those?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where did you get those?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寮会の手伝いをしたら貰えたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got them for helping the dorm head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got them for helping the dorm head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「折角だから、使おうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'll be a waste if I don't use them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'll be a waste if I don't use them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「映画かー…あんまり興味ねえな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Movies, huh... I'm not that interested.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Movies, huh... I'm not that interested.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「寝ちゃうからな、オレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I always fall asleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I always fall asleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「よし、理樹。俺と行こう。きっと楽しいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Alright, Riki. I'll come with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Alright, Riki. I'll come with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「と言いたいところだが、野郎といく場所じゃないな。野暮というものだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Or so I'd say, but you don't go to movies with your friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Or so I'd say, but you don't go to movies with your friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ロマンスの香りがするという意味だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I mean, it has romance written all over it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I mean, it has romance written all over it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女の子と行けってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean I should go with a girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean I should go with a girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「その通り。誰か誘ってやれ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Exactly. Invite someone, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Exactly. Invite someone, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いないよ、そんなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I don't have anyone to invite...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I don't have anyone to invite...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ひとりぐらいいるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There should be at least one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There should be at least one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いませんから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, really, there isn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, really, there isn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へっ、そうかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人はふっと笑うと、僕の髪の毛をわしゃわしゃと撫でつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato burst into a laugh, and started ruffling my hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato burst into a laugh, and started ruffling my hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なに、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-what is it, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-what is it, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでもねーよ。飯、食いに行くかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Noo-thing. Let's go eat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Noo-thing. Let's go eat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝R-right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝R-right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話をしながら学食へ向かうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: We kept talking while heading to the school cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kept talking while heading to the school cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて、今日は何を食べようかね、っと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright! What should I eat today? Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright! What should I eat today? Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はハヤシライスセットにするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll have a hashed meat and rice set.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll have a hashed meat and rice set.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、席を取ってくるからトレイお願いしていいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll grab some seats. Masato, can you get the trays?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll grab some seats. Masato, can you get the trays?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オッケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は真人に食券を渡して、席取りに向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave Masato the meal coupons and headed for the seats.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave Masato the meal coupons and headed for the seats.

MESSAGE.JP: それなりに混んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The cafeteria was pretty busy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cafeteria was pretty busy.

MESSAGE.JP: 見知った顔は…あった。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw a familiar face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw a familiar face.

MESSAGE.JP: クドがいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was sitting there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was sitting there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド。おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good morning, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good morning, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、リキ。ぐっどもーにんぐです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Riki. Guddo mo-ningu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Riki. Guddo mo-ningu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お昼ご飯ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Are you having lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Are you having lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだけど朝も食べてないからブランチだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it's brunch, since I didn't eat breakfast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it's brunch, since I didn't eat breakfast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぶらんち！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Buranchi!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Buranchi!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「外国っぽいですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That sounds foreign, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That sounds foreign, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドはひとり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you by yourself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you by yourself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さっきまでは鈴さんと小毬さんがいたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san and Komari-san were here until just now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san and Komari-san were here until just now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「猫さんのお世話をされるとかで、外行かれましたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They mentioned something about looking after a cat and left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They mentioned something about looking after a cat and left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、持ってきたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry to kept you waiting, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry to kept you waiting, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、クー公もいっしょか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh? Little Kuu is here too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh? Little Kuu is here too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐです、井ノ原さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Inohara-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu, Inohara-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　謙吾は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Where's Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Where's Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、なんか胴着につゆを掛けられたとかで洗いに行ったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aa, he got food on his clothes, and went back to wash his uniform.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aa, he got food on his clothes, and went back to wash his uniform.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか、そりゃ運がないねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sounds really unlucky...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sounds really unlucky...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あいつは…はしゃぎすぎだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He was... too energetic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He was... too energetic...❞
