MESSAGE.Translation: She should be heading here if she's trying to avoid people.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（いた…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There she is...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There she is...)

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんはうずくまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was crouching down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was crouching down.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-sa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-sa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…うぇっ……げほっ……」
のどを押えながら、二木さんは吐いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was holding her throat and vomiting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was holding her throat and vomiting.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だいじょうぶ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you alright!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you alright!?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Ah...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Ah...?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝―――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝―――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 近寄ろうとした僕は腕で払われた。
MESSAGE.EN: She brushed me aside as I tried to approach.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brushed me aside as I tried to approach.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ごほっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Guah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Guah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 払われた、腕。
MESSAGE.EN: The arm that she used.
MESSAGE.Translation: The arm that she used.

MESSAGE.JP: 間近で見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a closer look.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a closer look.

MESSAGE.JP: ――ひどかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ――It was horrible.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――It was horrible.

MESSAGE.JP: みみずばれのような…やけどのような。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like earthworms covering them... or burn marks...
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like earthworms covering them... or burn marks...

MESSAGE.JP: それがびっしり腕を覆っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The arms she was hiding were covered in wounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: The arms she was hiding were covered in wounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 水に透けたシャツから見える傷跡。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see the scars through the drenched shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see the scars through the drenched shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あ、ぅ……あっ……げほっ…ごほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Aa, ugh...... agh..... geh... urgh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Aa, ugh...... agh..... geh... urgh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吐き出すものがなくなったのか、胃液だけ吐いている。
MESSAGE.EN: As if she ran out of things to vomit, her gastric juice was coming out.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if she ran out of things to vomit, her gastric juice was coming out.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は屈んで背中をさすろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I bent over and tried to pat her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bent over and tried to pat her back.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱん、と手が払われた。
MESSAGE.EN: She brushed my hand away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brushed my hand away.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…わたしに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Don't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Don't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「さわるなぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...touch me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...touch me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 爪でひっかかれたところからうっすらと血が流れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Blood was oozing out from the place scratched by her nails.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blood was oozing out from the place scratched by her nails.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「はぁっ…はぁっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Haa... Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Haa... Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…さわるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Don't touch me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Don't touch me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「さわらないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't touch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't touch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「それいじょう、ちかづくな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't come any closer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't come any closer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「わたしに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Don't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Don't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「ちかづくなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...come closer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...come closer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まるで僕が見えていないかのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if I wasn't there.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if I wasn't there.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を僕だと認識できていないみたいに…僕以外の誰かを呪うみたいな目。
MESSAGE.EN: Seemingly unable to recognize me, she stared at me with eyes full of curses, as though at another person.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seemingly unable to recognize me, she stared at me with eyes full of curses, as though at another person.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎらぎらと憎しみに満ちているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a glare full of hatred.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a glare full of hatred.

MESSAGE.JP: ぞくりと身が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: I shivered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shivered.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ気持ちを味わったことがある…気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt... I've experienced this feeling before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt... I've experienced this feeling before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…触らないから、落ち着いて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Calm down, I won't touch you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Calm down, I won't touch you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん。わかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you hear me, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you hear me, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が誰かわかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you know who I am?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you know who I am?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…ごほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Geh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Geh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは苦しそうにえずいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san seemed to be in anguish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san seemed to be in anguish.

MESSAGE.JP: 気がつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの腕が震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her arms were trembling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her arms were trembling.

MESSAGE.JP: …目の前の女の子は何かに怯えてパニックになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Something had frightened the girl before me into a state of panic.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Something had frightened the girl before me into a state of panic.

MESSAGE.JP: 『こわいなにか』を憎みながら、怯えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was scared witless, while cursing that ❛something.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: She was scared witless, while cursing that ❛something.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二木さん、しっかりして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, get a hold of yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Futaki-san, get a hold of yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 繰り返し呼びかけると、二木さんの瞳に光が戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As I called out to her again and again, light started to return to her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I called out to her again and again, light started to return to her eyes.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Nao...... e?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Nao...... e?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて腕を抱いて俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She immediately cast her face down while holding her arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She immediately cast her face down while holding her arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…直枝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Naoe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Naoe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…そうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes... that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes... that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分の上着を脱ぐと、二木さんに羽織らせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took off my coat and handed it to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took off my coat and handed it to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「使って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく考えたら二木さんの上着は水でびしょびしょだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I thought about it, her coat was soaking wet.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I thought about it, her coat was soaking wet.

MESSAGE.JP: それより僕の上着のほうがいいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's better for her to use mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's better for her to use mine.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは黙って俯く。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san hung her head wordlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san hung her head wordlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理由や事情を訊く空気ではなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It doesn't seem like I should ask her about it right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: It doesn't seem like I should ask her about it right now.

MESSAGE.JP: でもずぶ濡れの女の子を放っておくわけにもいかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't just leave her drenched like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't just leave her drenched like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どうしよう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What should I do...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What should I do...)

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いいところに！
MESSAGE.EN: Nice timing!
MESSAGE.Translation: Nice timing!

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…何かと思えば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I was thinking something happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I was thinking something happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんの様子を見て、来ヶ谷さんは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san looked at Futaki-san and nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san looked at Futaki-san and nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「事情はよくわからんが、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think I get the gist of things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think I get the gist of things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「後は任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Leave the rest to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Leave the rest to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がった僕に、来ヶ谷さんは耳打ちをしてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I stood up, Kurugaya-san whispered into my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I stood up, Kurugaya-san whispered into my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あとで知らせよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll let you know later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll let you know later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう。お願いするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you. Please help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you. Please help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頭を下げて裏庭を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I hesitated a moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: I hesitated a moment...

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろ髪引かれる思いで。
MESSAGE.EN: ...but then I bowed and left the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...but then I bowed and left the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…少年はもう行ったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...The young man has left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...The young man has left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ハンカチを出しながら、私に向かって来ヶ谷さんは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san faces me while taking out a handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san faces me while taking out a handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミらしくもないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This isn't like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This isn't like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何か言い返そうとしたが、この有様では何も言えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to respond, but I couldn't say anything given my emotional state.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to respond, but I couldn't say anything given my emotional state.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何か言いたいだろうが、黙っていろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It seems you want to say something. Don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It seems you want to say something. Don't.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがごしごしとハンカチで口元をこする。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san wipes my mouth with the handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san wipes my mouth with the handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: 唾液や汚物を拭ったハンカチを、こともなげに再び自分の上着にしまう彼女。
MESSAGE.EN: As though it did not concern her in the slightest, she casually tucks the handkerchief that was laden with saliva and dirt into her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: As though it did not concern her in the slightest, she casually tucks the handkerchief that was laden with saliva and dirt into her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 私の腕にちらりと視線が向けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She takes a quick glance at my arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She takes a quick glance at my arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…見るのは…初めてですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Is it your first time... seeing this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Is it your first time... seeing this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…いや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Not really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Not really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 首を振る来ヶ谷さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She shakes her head..
MESSAGE.Translation: She shakes her head..

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「初めてではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's not the first time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's not the first time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どこにでもよくあることだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This happens everywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This happens everywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「普通が、『普通でない』ことは…よくあることだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This is not normal, but ❛abnormal things❜... happen often enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This is not normal, but ❛abnormal things❜... happen often enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「済まなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I am sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I am sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうして謝るんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Why are you apologizing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Why are you apologizing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「覚えていないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…あなたには、関係ないことですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Since it has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Since it has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうかもしれないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That may be so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That may be so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが、謝るべきは謝らねばならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝However, it's something I must apologize for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝However, it's something I must apologize for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…悪かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 醜い腕から視線を逸らす。
MESSAGE.EN: I avert my eyes from my unsightly arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I avert my eyes from my unsightly arms.

MESSAGE.JP: つまり…来ヶ谷さんの顔を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: And... I look at her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: And... I look at her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「『これ』が普通ではないとしても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Even though ❛this❜ may not be normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Even though ❛this❜ may not be normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「私にはこれが普通なので…あなたが気にすることはないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝It's normal for me... so you don't have to be so concerned about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝It's normal for me... so you don't have to be so concerned about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「こうあるように私は生まれたのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I was born like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I was born like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そのままでいるだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm just staying how I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm just staying how I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「そう認識されたのだから、そのようにあるだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I've recognized that's how things are, so that's all there is to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I've recognized that's how things are, so that's all there is to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…律儀だな。そんなところまで、悟らなくても良いだろうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You're too clever for your own good. You have no obligation to resign yourself to this idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You're too clever for your own good. You have no obligation to resign yourself to this idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これ以上何も問うまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I won't pry any further.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I won't pry any further.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今のキミがしなければならないことは、部屋でシャワーを浴びて寝てしまうことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All you need to do is go back to your room, take a shower and rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All you need to do is go back to your room, take a shower and rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「送ってやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll escort you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll escort you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんには、有無を言わせない迫力があった。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't refuse her pressure.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't refuse her pressure.

MESSAGE.JP: 寒気が襲ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I am struck by how cold I feel.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am struck by how cold I feel.

MESSAGE.JP: 我知らず上着の袖を引き寄せ…それが直枝の上着だと言うことに気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I have been unconsciously pulling the coat's sleeves tighter... I realize now that it's Naoe's.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have been unconsciously pulling the coat's sleeves tighter... I realize now that it's Naoe's.

MESSAGE.JP: 微かに血が上る。
MESSAGE.EN: My heart beats a little faster.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heart beats a little faster.

MESSAGE.JP: 恥ずかしくて、そして、とても苦しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's embarrassing, and at the same time, painful.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's embarrassing, and at the same time, painful.

MESSAGE.JP: 他人の匂いがする服は、ひどく疎ましい。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone else's smell is on the clothes I am wearing... how unpleasant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone else's smell is on the clothes I am wearing... how unpleasant.

MESSAGE.JP: 温もりが残っていれば…なおさらだった。
MESSAGE.EN: All the more so with the lingering warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the more so with the lingering warmth.

MESSAGE.JP: …翌日。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The next day.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The next day.

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日の騒ぎは、ごく一部の生徒しか知らないはずだったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Only a small fraction of the students should've known about yesterday's commotion. However.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only a small fraction of the students should've known about yesterday's commotion. However.

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「聞いた？　…組の二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Did you hear? ...Futaki-san from class...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Did you hear? ...Futaki-san from class...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「うん、見たひとの話によるとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Yeah, according to someone who saw it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Yeah, according to someone who saw it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 噂話はあっという間に広まるものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The rumors had spread in the blink of an eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rumors had spread in the blink of an eye.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「メールありがとう、来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for the text, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for the text, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日の夜ついたメール。
MESSAGE.EN: She had texted me last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had texted me last night.

MESSAGE.JP: 『部屋に無事送っていった』
MESSAGE.EN: [I sent her back to her room.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I sent her back to her room.]

MESSAGE.JP: その文面にすごくほっとしたのでお礼を伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: The mail really relieved me, so I wanted to say thanks.
MESSAGE.Translation: The mail really relieved me, so I wanted to say thanks.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大したことじゃない…ところで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's fine... by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's fine... by the way.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ここではなんだな。場所を移すか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This place is a little... Let's move somewhere else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This place is a little... Let's move somewhere else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝R-right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝R-right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人の少ない階段まで連れ出される。
MESSAGE.EN: She took me to a staircase with few people around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took me to a staircase with few people around.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「様子はどうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How was she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How was she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今朝か？　普段どおりではあったらしいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝This morning? She seemed normal enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This morning? She seemed normal enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「小毬君やクドリャフカ君がだいぶ気にしていたようだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It seems Komari-kun and Kudryavka-kun are also concerned about her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It seems Komari-kun and Kudryavka-kun are also concerned about her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「話を聞きたがっていたが、何も話してはいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They asked about it, but I didn't tell them anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They asked about it, but I didn't tell them anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、二木さんのことだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, about Futaki-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, about Futaki-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「詳しい事情は知らん。私が無理に関わることでもないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know the details, but I didn't want to dig any further.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know the details, but I didn't want to dig any further.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは来ヶ谷さんの優しさでもある。
MESSAGE.EN: That was also part of Kuragaya-san's kindness.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was also part of Kuragaya-san's kindness.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…ただ、少年がどうするかは、自由だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...However, you can do as you wish, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...However, you can do as you wish, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 遅い昼食になってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up having a late lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up having a late lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: トレイを持って空いた席を見つけ座る。
MESSAGE.EN: While carrying the tray, I sat down at an empty seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: While carrying the tray, I sat down at an empty seat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ようやくひとが少なくなった学食を誰かをさがすように歩くクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be searching for someone in the almost empty cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be searching for someone in the almost empty cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり見つからなかったのか、しょんぼりと肩を落としていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She drooped her shoulders dejectedly. Maybe she didn't find whoever she was looking for.
MESSAGE.Translation: She drooped her shoulders dejectedly. Maybe she didn't find whoever she was looking for.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クードっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド？　ずいぶん遅い時間だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?　It's quite late, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?　It's quite late, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はろーです、リキ。リキも遅いですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro, Riki. You are late, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro, Riki. You are late, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰かさがしてた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you searching for someone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you searching for someone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…佳奈多さんを探していたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I was looking for Kanata-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I was looking for Kanata-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の向かいに座るクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat down in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat down in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: トレイの上には、ナポリタンスパゲティが載っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was Napolitan spaghetti on the tray.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was Napolitan spaghetti on the tray.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（クドが食べるにしては量が多いな…ふたり分？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(That is a lot for just Kud... is it meant for two?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(That is a lot for just Kud... is it meant for two?)

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうも避けられているようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She seems to be avoiding me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She seems to be avoiding me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは箸を使ってちまちまとスパゲティを食べ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud started nibbling at the spaghetti with chopsticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud started nibbling at the spaghetti with chopsticks.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのさ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…二木さんのことだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's about Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's about Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「噂話のことですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is it the rumor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is it the rumor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの顔が曇る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's face clouded over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's face clouded over.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... Do you know it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Do you know it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…噂話が流れているのは知っていますが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I know a rumor is spreading but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I know a rumor is spreading but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドは、知ってるの…？　二木さんの、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, about Futaki-san... Do you know, that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, about Futaki-san... Do you know, that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「腕のことですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is it her arms?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is it her arms?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「詳しい事情は知りません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know the details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't know the details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ただ、辛い目にあったことを思い出してしまうのだそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I only know they remind her of something unpleasant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I only know they remind her of something unpleasant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「普段は平気みたいなのですが…気を張っていない時に見られるとだめみたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She is normally alright but... when she's caught off guard, it doesn't go well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She is normally alright but... when she's caught off guard, it doesn't go well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お風呂の時に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝One time in the bath...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝One time in the bath...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あのときも、佳奈多さんはパニックになって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Futaki-san panicked just like this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Futaki-san panicked just like this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「大変でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was a disaster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was a disaster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…見られないように、ひとりでお風呂に入っていたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...She always took a bath alone so no one could see her skin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...She always took a bath alone so no one could see her skin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私が無理矢理誘ったせいでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was my fault for insisting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was my fault for insisting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud hanged her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud hanged her head.

MESSAGE.JP: なんと言ったらいいかわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「何か事故にあったのかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Maybe there was an accident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Maybe there was an accident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私のおかあさんも、ふとももにおっきなやけど跡があって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My mom also has a big burn scar on her thigh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My mom also has a big burn scar on her thigh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「見せて貰ったことがあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She had shown it to me before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She had shown it to me before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「実験失敗したときのものだとか言ってましたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She said it was from some failed experiment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She said it was from some failed experiment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんのも、そういう傷かも、しれませんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san's scar... it could be something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san's scar... it could be something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「きっと…そうですよ。誰かから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sure... that's the case. If someone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sure... that's the case. If someone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 傷つけられた跡じゃない。クドはそう言いかけて口ごもったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't from a purposely inflicted wound. That's probably what Kud was trying to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't from a purposely inflicted wound. That's probably what Kud was trying to say.

MESSAGE.JP: せめて自分の不注意でついた傷だといい。
MESSAGE.EN: It would surely be better if it was from a careless mistake.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would surely be better if it was from a careless mistake.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそうでないのだろう、とクドは考えている。
MESSAGE.EN: But Kud probably didn't believe that to be true.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Kud probably didn't believe that to be true.

MESSAGE.JP: 他人から傷つけられたものでないといい。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be better if it wasn't inflicted on her by someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be better if it wasn't inflicted on her by someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: そう信じたいために、言い聞かせているような口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was trying to persuade herself that was the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was trying to persuade herself that was the case.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…佳奈多さんを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Kanata-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Kanata-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「たすけてあげてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは深々と頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud made a deep bow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud made a deep bow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「く、クド。どうして頭を下げるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝K-Kud, why are you bowing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝K-Kud, why are you bowing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんはよくうなされています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san often has nightmares.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san often has nightmares.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「とても、とてもつらいことがあって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It seems really, really painful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It seems really, really painful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今も、苦しんでいるのでしょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even now, she is probably suffering...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even now, she is probably suffering...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…私では…」
`クド@「役に立ちません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I cannot help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I cannot help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私には、何も話してくれないんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She won't tell me anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She won't tell me anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「傷跡を、気味悪がらないでいてくれるだけで十分だ、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's already enough that I'm not disgusted by her scars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's already enough that I'm not disgusted by her scars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんは言うのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kanata-san said that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kanata-san said that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それだけしか、言ってくれないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She won't say anything else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She won't say anything else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私が頼りないからなのでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is it because I'm unreliable?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is it because I'm unreliable?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私が自分だけで手一杯だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Since I have my hands full with myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Since I have my hands full with myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…私は…」
`クド@「役立たずです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...am useless...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...am useless...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だいじなお友達の悩みを解決してあげられないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't help my precious friend with her worries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't help my precious friend with her worries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud looked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud looked up.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…本当に…役に立ちません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I really am... useless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I really am... useless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはさみしそうに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud had a lonely smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud had a lonely smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だから、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「佳奈多さんを助けてあげてください…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please help Kanata-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please help Kanata-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おねがいします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはもう一度、頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed once again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は何も出来ないかもしれないよ、と言おうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to say I may not be able to do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to say I may not be able to do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それを言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「できること、やってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will do what I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will do what I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…ありがとです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Thank you, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Thank you, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何か困ったことがあったら、クドも手伝ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If there's a problem, please help me out, OK?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If there's a problem, please help me out, OK?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…え、でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Eh, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Eh, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドは二木さんの役に立ちたいんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You want to be of help to Futaki-san, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You want to be of help to Futaki-san, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Y-yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Y-yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、そういうときは絶対来るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, there will be a time when she needs your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, there will be a time when she needs your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのときは…手伝って欲しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When the time comes... I want you to help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When the time comes... I want you to help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「……リキ」
`クド@「わかりました！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Understood!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Understood!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あいあいさー、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Aye aye sir - desu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Aye aye sir - desu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはようやく元気な口調で頷いてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud finally nodded cheerfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud finally nodded cheerfully.
